text: How can I start a task?
title: How can I start a task?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can start a task by clicking on the action button next to it, which will redirect you to a relevant screen to complete the task or by doing the same action while navigating through app.\nFor example, ‘Play a game’ task can be completed by clicking on ‘Play now’ and then playing the game that is automatically launched or by selecting any game tile in the home screen and playing a game.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Which games are supported in World War?
title: Which games are supported in Team Clash?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "All the games where you get a score can have a Team Clash tournament but we are currently live in a few games.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Why am I asked for an entry fee again after x attempts?
title: Why am I asked for an entry fee again after few attempts?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "In a Multiple entry fee format, users get limited attempts. But users can get more attempts by paying a smaller entry fee again.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is Single Entry vs Multiple Entry?
title: What is Single Entry vs Multiple Entry?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "In single entry by paying an entry fee once you get unlimited attempts. In multiple entry format after every few attempts you can re-enter by paying a small re-entry fee.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How’s the prize distributed among the players in Single Entry Format?
title: How’s the prize distributed among the players in Single Entry Format?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Total prize pool is distributed equally among all the users of the winning team.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How’s the prize distributed among the players in Multiple Entry Format?
title: How’s the prize distributed among the players in Multiple Entry Format?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "It is a multiple entry event and users with more entries get higher prizes.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is All score vs Best Score?
title: What is All score vs Best Score?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "In All Score formats, all the scores are added to your Team Score whereas in Best Score, only the highest score of the user across attempts is added to the Team Score.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: I was winning some amount while I was playing but after the tournament ended I didn’t receive the prize
title: I was winning some amount while I was playing but after the tournament ended I didn’t receive the prize
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Winning shown in the events home page are tentative and are finalized only after the tournament ends. Please check the results tab to validate if your team won or not.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Why am I seeing Closed even though sufficient time is left for the tournament to end?
title: Why am I seeing Closed even though sufficient time is left for the tournament to end?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You are seeing \"Closed\" because you must have exhausted the maximum number of retries available for this tournament.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How are teams assigned in World War?
title: How are teams assigned in Team Clash?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "We don’t control the team assignment, it is assigned randomly to the users.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: I am getting the same opponent again and again. How is that possible?
title: मला तोच प्रतिस्पर्धी पुन्हा पुन्हा मिळत आहे. ते कसे शक्य आहे?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "आमचे मॅचमेकिंग अल्गोरिदम हे सुनिश्चित करते की, आपण आपल्यासारखे कौशल्य असलेल्या पातळीच्या प्रतिस्पर्ध्याशी जुळत आहात. हे निष्पक्षता सुनिश्चित करते आणि स्पर्धात्मक वातावरण तयार करते. काहीवेळा, तो प्लेअर आपल्या कौशल्य पातळीशी जुळतो आणि खेळण्यास तयार असल्याने आपल्याला तोच प्रतिस्पर्धी पुन्हा मिळतो.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How do I get the TDS certificate?
title: How do I get the TDS certificate?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Aap TDS pramaan patra ke liye Graahak Sahayata  se sampark kar sakte hain. Hum isme aage aapki madad karenge.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How can I sell my team?
title: How can I sell my team?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can sell your team by going to the leaderboard for that contest and setting an ask price ofr the team. Click on 'SELL' to open a screen where you can input the values required and confirm to sell the team. Your team will go on sale on doing so.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I scored in my previous attempt/gameplay but my team score is not updating?
title: I scored in my previous attempt/gameplay but my team score is not updating?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You must be playing the Best Score format. In this format, the highest score is only added to the team score. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Games - I am sure that my opponent has done cheating. What do I do?
title: મને ખાતરી છે કે મારો પ્રતિસ્પર્ધી ચીટિંગકરી રહ્યો છે. હું શું કરું?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "જો તમે ભારપૂર્વક માનો છો કે તમારો પ્રતિસ્પર્ધી ચીટિંગ કરવામાં સામેલ છે, તો કૃપા કરીને ગ્રાહક સપોર્ટનો કોન્ટેક્ટ કરો અને અમને ખાતરી કરવામાં મદદ કરો કે MPL તેના યુઝરને ફેઅર ગેમપ્લે પ્રદાન કરે છે", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Games - I am sure that my opponent has done cheating. What do I do?
title: मला खात्री आहे की, माझ्या प्रतिस्पर्ध्याने चीटिंग केली आहे. मी काय करू?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "आपला प्रतिस्पर्धी चीटिंग करण्यात गुंतलेला आहे असा आपला ठाम विश्वास असल्यास, कृपया ग्राहक सपोर्टशी संपर्क साधा आणि MPL त्याच्या वापरकर्त्यांसाठी फेअर गेमप्ले प्रदान करण्यात मदत करा", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is Call Break?
title: કોલ બ્રેક શું છે?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "કોલ બ્રેક એ ચાર પ્લેયર કાર્ડ ગેમ છે જે 52 કાર્ડના ડેક સાથે રમવામાં આવે છે. કાર્ડ્સ પ્લેયરો વચ્ચે સમાન રીતે અને રેન્ડમ રીતે વહેંચવામાં આવે છે (દરેકને 13 કાર્ડ). હવે, પ્લેયરોએ તેમની સંભવિત જીતી શકાય તેવી યુક્તિઓનો અંદાજ કાઢવો પડશે અને કોલ કરવો પડશે અને તેઓએ ઓછામાં ઓછી 1 યુક્તિ કોલ કરવી પડશે. સામાન્ય રીતે રમતમાં 4 રાઉન્ડ ત્યાં હોય છે. તમામ રાઉન્ડના અંતે, સ્કોરની ગણતરી કરવામાં આવે છે અને વિનર જાહેર કરવામાં આવે છે.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}, {"type": "VIDEO", "details": {"title": " ", "videoSrc": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/7a964c54839d4240932b4608242b920e.mp4", "titlePreset": "s1", "thumbnailSrc": "", "titleTextColor": "black"}}]}

text: What are battles?
title: What are battles?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "MPL Battles are single play 1v1 competitions. You can register by paying an entry fee to enter the battle and generate a score against your opponent. The player with the higher score wins the cash prize.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Where can I find the amount that has been deducted?
title: Where can I find the amount that has been deducted?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can see it by logging into your account on bank's website/app. You may also receive an SMS from your bank.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Call Break?
title: कॉल ब्रेक म्हणजे काय?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "कॉल ब्रेक हा चार प्लेअरचा कार्ड गेम आहे जो 52 कार्ड्सच्या डेकसह खेळला जातो. कार्ड्स प्लेअरमध्ये समान आणि रॅंडमपद्धतीने वितरीत केले जातात (प्रत्येकी 13 कार्डे). आता, प्लेअर्सना त्यांच्या संभाव्य जिंकण्यायोग्य युक्त्यांचा अंदाज लावावा लागेल आणि त्यांना कॉल करणे आवश्यक आहे आणि त्यांनी किमान 1 युक्ती कॉल करणे आवश्यक आहे. एका स्कोअर गेममध्ये सहसा 4 राउंड असतात. सर्व राउंडच्या शेवटी, पॉइंटची गणना केली जाते आणि विजेता घोषित केला जातो. सर्वाधिक पॉइंट मिळवणाऱ्या प्लेअरला विजेता घोषित केले जाते.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}, {"type": "VIDEO", "details": {"title": " ", "videoSrc": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/7a964c54839d4240932b4608242b920e.mp4", "titlePreset": "s1", "thumbnailSrc": "", "titleTextColor": "black"}}]}

text: I did not receive the sign up bonus.
title: मला साइन अप बोनस मिळाला नाही.
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "साइनअप बोनस फक्त नवीन युजर ज्याने यापूर्वी MPL वर नोंदणी केली नाही तो सामील झाल्यावर मिळते आणि आयुष्यात एकदाच जमा केला जातो. आपण नवीन युजर असल्यास, कृपया ग्राहक सपोर्टशी संपर्क साधा.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How do I unblock MPL account?
title: How do I unblock MPL account?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Customers can reach us on email uscommunity@mplgaming.com to request unblocking of their account.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How can I change my account information?
title: How can I change my account information?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can change your name, profile picture and bio in the MPL profile section of the app. Click on the top left icon on the home page to access the profile section, and then click on \"Edit profile”.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Why do I need to agree to the age related terms?
title: Why do I need to agree to the age related terms?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Only users over the age of 18 years and above are eligible to play on MPL. You are therefore required to agree to the age related terms so that we can determine your eligibility to register and play on MPL. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Can I have multiple accounts on MPL?
title: Can I have multiple accounts on MPL?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can set up only one account on MPL. Having multiple accounts for the same user is against our Terms of Service and may lead to suspension or termination of the account(s).", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How do I Delete my MPL Account?
title: How do I Delete my MPL Account?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can visit your MPL profile page and proceed with your MPL account deletion.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Am I entitled to a sign up bonus?
title: Am I entitled to a sign up bonus?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You will receive a sign up bonus after successfully completing the sign up process through any of the available methods (Google or Apple Account) and logging in on the MPL app.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Can I invite friends to join MPL?
title: Can I invite friends to join MPL?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can invite a friend by tapping on the “Refer & Earn” button at the bottom of the app. Go to “Your Referrals” and tap on any of the available sharing options to share your referral code and an install link by text message, email or other messaging/social media apps on your phone.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I am under 18 years of age. Am I allowed to register and play on MPL?
title: I am under 18 years of age. Am I allowed to register and play on MPL?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Only players above the age of 18 are allowed to register and play on MPL, except in Alabama and Nebraska, where the minimum age requirement is 19.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How do I move cards?
title: How do I move cards?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can select a card from the peaks that is either one rank higher or lower than the current foundation card, the suit and color do not matter.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: What happens if I exit the game before the battle ends?
title: What happens if I exit the game before the battle ends?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If you exit the game before the battle ends then your latest recorded score will get submitted in the game.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is the battle game format?
title: What is the battle game format?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "In MPL’s battle game format, you will be able to play 1v1 battles across games. We will match you with an online player of similar skill. If no one is available at your skill-level at the time, you can still play your game and submit the score while MPL will keep working to match you with the next available similarly skilled opponent. Alternatively you may get matched with a player at your skill level who previously played and already submitted a score earlier.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Who is a Starter and Challenger in the games?
title: Who is a Starter and Challenger in the games?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "There are 2 kinds of players in an asynchronous game, the ‘Starter’ and the ‘Challenger’. The Starter is the player who starts the game but does not have a matching opponent at that point. The player plays the game but needs to wait for a challenger. The Challenger is the player who gets matched with a Starter based on the skill level and lobby. The moment the Starter starts the game, the Starter becomes a part of the Starter pool and is ready to be matched.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How long will I have to wait for the results if I participated in an asynchronous game?
title: How long will I have to wait for the results if I participated in an asynchronous game?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If the player is a Challenger then the player will get instantly matched with the starter and will get the results of the match after the player’s game ends. If the player is a starter then the application will try to find a challenger who is similar to the player’s skill and match them, but if the application is not able to find a match within 7 days then the entry fee is refunded to the player.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What are Coins and how do I earn them?
title: What are Coins and how do I earn them?

text: What happened to my Bonus cash?
title: What happened to my Bonus cash?

text: Why change Bonus cash to Coins?
title: Why change Bonus cash to Coins?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Your Bonus cash was rebranded to Coins to ensure a standardization of virtual currency across MPL platforms and geographies.\n\nNow you can easily differentiate between your deposit/winnings cash balance and your virtual cash (Coins).", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What are coupons? How do I use them?
title: What are coupons? How do I use them?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Coupons are MPL rewards from which you can earn cashbacks and a lot more! You can use available coupons when you deposit money into the MPL wallet.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: When do I get winnings cash into my MPL account?
title: When do I get winnings cash into my MPL account?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Winnings cash will get credited to your MPL wallet upon the completion of any cash game format.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Is it safe to provide card details to MPL?
title: Is it safe to provide card details to MPL?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "MPL does not store any payment details shared by you. We partner with third party payment providers who facilitate all transactions for us. Your data will be securely stored in compliance with applicable laws.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: My deposited amount did not get credited to my MPL account, when and how will I get the refund?
title: My deposited amount did not get credited to my MPL account, when and how will I get the refund?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Please contact our Customer Support team who will verify if the amount was not added due to a technical issue. In this scenario, our team will credit the amount to your wallet. However, if you made a successful repeat transaction for the same amount, you can provide the proof to our Customer Support team and we can refund the amount for the previously tried transaction.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is the minimum and maximum amount I can withdraw?
title: What is the minimum and maximum amount I can withdraw?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Yes, there are certain limits set on per transaction value and cumulative amount:

Minimum $1 per withdrawal
Maximum $50 per withdrawal
Maximum $200 per day", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is the Withdrawal fee/charge?
title: What is the Withdrawal fee/charge?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "A Withdrawal fee will be charged to you when you withdraw any amount from your winnings cash.\n\nMPL charges a standard $1.50 fee for any amount below $10. No withdrawal fee is charged for a withdrawal amount of $10 or more.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: My withdrawal request is pending, how long will it take?
title: My withdrawal request is pending, how long will it take?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "For PayPal withdrawals, most transactions are instantaneous. However, in some cases, it may take up to 6 hours to receive the withdrawal amount.\n\nIf you choose to withdraw via your bank account, it may take up to 4 working days depending on your bank to process the withdrawal. If it takes longer, please contact your bank for more information.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: My withdrawal request is cancelled, what should I do?
title: My withdrawal request is cancelled, what should I do?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If your withdrawal request is cancelled, your money will return to your winnings balance, and you can initiate the withdrawal again.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Are there any deposit limits on MPL?
title: Are there any deposit limits on MPL?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Yes, there are certain limits set on per transaction value and cumulative amount:

Minimum $1 per deposit
Maximum $300 per deposit
Maximum $500 per day", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I have not received money in my bank account yet, what should I do?
title: I have not received money in my bank account yet, what should I do?

text: How do I change my bank account that is linked to MPL?
title: How do I change my bank account that is linked to MPL?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You will not be able to change your bank account for withdrawals.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I have deposited money on MPL but I am unable to play cash games?
title: I have deposited money on MPL but I am unable to play cash games?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "In order to comply with state-level laws, MPL does not allow users to access cash games in certain states - please refer to our Terms of Service for more information on this. In the event that you are unable to play cash games due to this, please contact us at uscommunity@mplgaming.com  and we will help you with the refund. Please note that deposits cannot be directly refunded if any funds have been used to enter or play cash games.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Why do I have to verify my card?
title: Why do I have to verify my card?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "This is to protect our users against any fraudulent usage of their cards by scammers.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What happens if I do not verify my card?
title: What happens if I do not verify my card?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You would not be allowed to make any payments using that card.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What if I don't want to keep my card saved on the app?
title: What if I don't want to keep my card saved on the app?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can always delete your card information by going to Payment Settings.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Do I need to go through this check everytime I use my card?
title: Do I need to go through this check everytime I use my card?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "It is one time process. If your card is saved on our app, you would not have to go through this verification again.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How to play Call Break?
title: કોલ બ્રેક કેવી રીતે રમવું?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": ""દરેક પ્લેયરે રાઉન્ડ સ્ટાર્ટ કરતા પહેલા તેઓ જીતવાની અપેક્ષા રાખે છે તે યુક્તિઓની સંખ્યા જાહેર કરવાની જરૂર છે. કોઈપણ રાઉન્ડ રમતી વખતે, દરેક પ્લેયરે નીચેના ઓર્ડરમાં કાર્ડ ફેંકવું આવશ્યક છે: 
- ઉચ્ચ રેન્કનું લીડ સૂટ કાર્ડ ફેંકો
- કોઈપણ લીડ સૂટ કાર્ડ ફેંકો
- ટ્રમ્પ સૂટ કાર્ડ ફેંકો
- કોઈપણ સૂટ કાર્ડ ફેંકો 

દરેક યુક્તિ તે રાઉન્ડમાં ફેંકવામાં આવેલા ઉચ્ચ ક્રમાંકિત કાર્ડ દ્વારા જીતવામાં આવે છે, અને સ્પેડ્સ તમામ રાઉન્ડમાં ડિફોલ્ટ ટ્રમ્પ છે. 

ગેમને વિગતવાર સમજવા માટે, કૃપા કરીને અહીં ક્લિક કરો."", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}, {"type": "VIDEO", "details": {"title": " ", "videoSrc": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/acf9b9c7e0df4b86a78c4a623fb676ed.mp4", "titlePreset": "s1", "thumbnailSrc": "", "titleTextColor": "black"}}]}

text: I did not receive the referral reward even though my friend joined MPL
title: મારો મિત્ર MPL સાથે જોઈન થયા હોવા છતાં મને રેફરલ રિવોર્ડ મળ્યો નથી
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "જો તમારા મિત્રએ MPL પર સાઈન અપ કરવા માટે લિંક અથવા કોડનો ઉપયોગ ન કર્યો હોય અથવા તમારા મિત્રનું ઉપકરણ MPL પર પહેલેથી જ રજીસ્ટર હોય તો રેફરલ રિવોર્ડ આપવામાં આવશે નહીં.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is the scoring system in the game?

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Users accumulate points based on the quality of their daubs (Perfect, Good, or Correct). Bonus points are given for achieving Bingo formations (Row, Column, Diagonal, or Fullhouse). Points are subtracted as penalties for incorrect daubing.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: What is MPL Fairplay?
title: What is MPL Fairplay?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "MPL Fairplay is the highest benchmark of protection against fraud and cheating offered by the MPL gaming platform. It is the brand’s assurance to you – the gamer – of the measures taken to ensure fair gameplay experience and practices. By doing so, we enable all gamers on our platform to focus entirely on playing and winning games without having to worry about things like data breaches, transactional security, or hacking. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Aap uss contest ke leaderboard par jaakar apni team ko bech sakte hain aur team ke liye ask price pesh kar sakte hain. 'Bechein' per click karein, ek screen khulegi jahan aap pesh ki gayi kimat ko dal sakte hain aur team ko bechne ki pushti kar sakte hain. Aisa karne say apki team bikri ke liye chali jaegi.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How can I sell my team?
title: मैं अपनी टीम को कैसे बेच सकता हूँ?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "आप उस कॉन्टेस्ट के लीडरबोर्ड पर जाकर अपनी टीम को बेच सकते हैं और टीम के लिए आस्क प्राइस पेश कर सकते हैं। 'बेचें' पर क्लिक करें, एक स्क्रीन खुलेगी जहां आप पेश की गयी कीमत डाल सकते हैं और टीम को बेचने की पुष्टि कर सकते हैं। ऐसा करने से आपकी टीम बिक्री के लिए चली जाएगी।", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How can I sell my team?
title: నేను నా టీమ్ ను ఎలా విక్రయించగలను?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "మీరు ఆ కంటెస్ట్ కోసం లీడర్‌బోర్డ్‌కి వెళ్లి, టీమ్ అడిగిన ధరను సెట్ చేయడం ద్వారా మీ బృందాన్ని విక్రయించవచ్చు. మీరు అవసరమైన విలువలను ఇన్‌పుట్ చేయగల స్క్రీన్‌ను తెరవడానికి 'SELL'పై క్లిక్ చేయండి మరియు టీమ్ ను విక్రయించడాన్ని ధృవీకరించండి. మీ టీమ్ అలా అమ్మకానికి సిద్ధమవుతుంది.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How can I sell my team?
title: எனது டீமை நான் எப்படி விற்க முடியும்?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "அந்த போட்டிக்கான லீடர்போர்டிற்குச் சென்று, டீமின் கேட்கும் விலையை நிர்ணயிப்பதன் மூலம் உங்கள் டீமை விற்கலாம். தேவையான மதிப்புகளை உள்ளீடு செய்து டீமை விற்பதை உறுதிசெய்யும் ஸ்கிரீனைத் திறக்க 'விற்க' என்பதைக் கிளிக் செய்யவும். அவ்வாறு செய்வதன் மூலம் உங்கள் டீம் விற்பனைக்கு வரும்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How can I buy teams?
title: Main teamein kaise kharid sakta hun?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Match ke live hone ke baad, aap live match page se teamon ko kharid sakte hain aur sabhi yogya contests ke leaderboard ke saath lad sakte hain. Aap boli ki prakriya shuru karne ke liye 'Boli' par click kar sakte hain. Yadi team ka malik aapki boli swikar karta hai to aapne vah team kharid li hai. YAA aap team ke malik dwara nirdharit 'ask price' par team kharid sakte hain.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How can I report any fraud players?
title: How can I report any fraud players?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Customers can reach out to our customer support team and report a fraud incident. Alternatively, customers can also reach us on email uscommunity@mplgaming.com.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Why did my identity verification fail?
title: Why did my identity verification fail?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Identity verification will fail if you enter incorrect/outdated information. Please ensure you enter your correct and updated name, date of birth, and address.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What measures does MPL take for collusion/Fraud Protection?
title: What measures does MPL take for collusion/Fraud Protection?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "1. New age technology to prevent suspicious behavior
Our cutting-edge fraud prevention technology detects any suspicious behavior in the background such as usage of rooted devices or hacking tools on the playing device and initiates appropriate action.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}, {"text": "2. Machine Learning-Based Fraud Detection Algorithms.
Our internal machine learning-based cheating detection systems run round the clock to catch any cheating or fraudulent behavior based on gameplay patterns, and automatically bring this to the attention of our Customer Excellence team, which then takes appropriate actions. It helps keep the app environment safe from hacking and other unscrupulous practices. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}, {"text": "3. Anti Money Laundering Checks
We also ensure that the gaming platform is never used as a mechanism to launder money. Our internal transaction and gameplay monitoring systems promptly detect and report such instances, keeping all laundering activities in check. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}, {"text": "4. Empowering Users to Report Fraud/Cheating
Head to the “Support” section on the app (which is MPL’s Helpdesk) and find the option to “Report User” who you believe is cheating or “Report a fraud” to highlight gameplay where you feel you were cheated. The option allows you to elaborate on issues that you can substantiate with relevant screenshots/videos.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}, {"text": "5. Punishing Users for Misconduct
We reserve the right to penalize users for instances of misconduct on a case-by-case basis. If we find a user actively engaging in any cheating or fraudulent activity, we may permanently ban them from the app and forfeit their winnings. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}, {"text": "Other Ways We Protect Our Gamers:
1. Other Ways We Protect Our Gamers
We use top-notch data security tools and practices to ensure that user data stays private and secure at all times. We regularly test our systems using both manual and automated processes internally and externally. As a gaming company, data protection is undoubtedly our numero uno.  

2. Payment Security
All transactional information is stored in a safe and secure environment. We collaborate with reliable, well-established third-party payment gateways, including PayPal and Apple Pay to ensure seamless transactions. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What are the winnings against the hand rankings?
title: What are the winnings against the hand rankings?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The winnings are a multiplier on the amount you have bet. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How can I buy teams?
title: குழுக்களை எப்படி வாங்கலாம்?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "கன்டெஸ்ட் லைவ்க்கு வந்த பிறகு, நீங்கள் லைவ் மேட்ச் பக்கத்தில் இருந்து டீம்களை வாங்கலாம் மற்றும் தகுதியான அனைத்து கன்டெஸ்ட்களின் லீடர்போர்டுகளிலும் போட்டியிடலாம். ஏல செயல்முறையைத் தொடங்க 'ஏலம்' என்பதைக் கிளிக் செய்யலாம். டீமின் உரிமையாளர் உங்கள் ஏலத்தை ஏற்றுக்கொண்டால், நீங்கள் அந்த டீமை வாங்கிவிடுவீர்கள். அல்லது டீமின் உரிமையாளர் நிர்ணயித்த 'கேள்வி விலையில்' டீமை வாங்கலாம்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How can I buy teams?
title: నేను టీమ్స్ ను ఎలా కొనగలను?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "మ్యాచ్ లైవ్ ప్రసారం అయిన తర్వాత, మీరు లైవ్ మ్యాచ్ పేజీ నుండి జట్‌లను కొనుగోలు చేయవచ్చు మరియు అర్హత ఉన్న అన్ని పోటీల లీడర్‌బోర్డ్‌లకు పోటీ చేయవచ్చు. బిడ్డింగ్ ప్రక్రియను ప్రారంభించడానికి మీరు 'బిడ్'పై క్లిక్ చేయవచ్చు. టీమ్ యజమాని మీ బిడ్‌ను అంగీకరిస్తే మీరు ఆ టీమ్ ను కొనుగోలు చేసారు. లేదా మీరు టీమ్ యజమాని నిర్ణయించిన 'ఆస్క్ ప్రైస్' వద్ద టీమ్ ను కొనుగోలు చేయవచ్చు.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How can I buy teams?
title: मैं टीमें कैसे खरीद सकता हूं?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "मैच के लाइव होने के बाद, आप लाइव मैच पेज से टीमों को खरीद सकते हैं और सभी योग्य कॉन्टेस्ट के लीडरबोर्ड के साथ लड़ सकते हैं। आप बोली की प्रक्रिया शुरू करने के लिए 'बोली' पर क्लिक कर सकते हैं। यदि टीम का मालिक आपकी बोली स्वीकार करता है तो आपने वह टीम खरीद ली है। या आप टीम के मालिक द्वारा निर्धारित 'आस्क प्राइस' पर टीम खरीद सकते हैं।", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is Fantasy Pro?
title: Fantasy Pro kya hai?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Live matchon ke dauraan, aap match page per ja sakte hain aur khareedne/bechne ke liye koi bhi team chun sakte hain. Agar yah apki team hai, to aap ise bech sakte hain. Agar yah apki team nahin hai, to aap ise kharid sakte hain. Keemat vah hogi jimein donon kharidaar aur bechne wala sahamat ho jaate hain.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is Fantasy Pro?
title: फैंटेसी प्रो क्या है?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "लाइव मैचों के दौरान, आप मैच पेज पर जा सकते हैं और खरीदने/बेचने के लिए कोई भी टीम चुन सकते हैं। अगर यह आपकी टीम है, तो आप इसे बेच सकते हैं। अगर यह आपकी टीम नहीं है, तो आप इसे खरीद सकते हैं। कीमत वह होगी जिसमें दोनों खरीदार और बेचने वाला सहमत हो जाते हैं।", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is Fantasy Pro?

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "లైవ్ మ్యాచ్‌ల సమయంలో, మీరు మ్యాచ్ పేజీకి వెళ్లి కొనుగోలు/అమ్మేందుకు ఏదైనా టీమ్ ను ఎంచుకోవచ్చు. ఇది మీ టీమ్ అయితే, మీరు దానిని అమ్మవచ్చు. ఇది మీ టీమ్ కాకపోతే, మీరు దానిని కొనుగోలు చేయవచ్చు. కొనుగోలుదారు మరియు సెల్లర్ మధ్య అంగీకరించబడినది ధర.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is Fantasy Pro?
title: ஃபேண்டஸி ப்ரோ என்றால் என்ன?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "லைவ் போட்டிகளின் போது, நீங்கள் போட்டிப் பக்கத்திற்குச் சென்று வாங்க/விற்க எந்த டீமையும் தேர்வு செய்யலாம். இது உங்கள் டீமாக இருந்தால், நீங்கள் அதை விற்கலாம். இது உங்கள் டீம் இல்லையென்றால், நீங்கள் அதை வாங்கலாம். ப்ரைஸ்\tஎன்பது வாங்குபவருக்கும் விற்பவருக்கும் இடையில் ஒப்புக் கொள்ளப்பட்டதாகும்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

title: ఇందులో MPL ద్వారా ఏదైనా కమీషన్ వసూలు చేస్తారా?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "అవును. MPL తన సెల్లర్ నుండి పూర్తయిన అన్ని ట్రేడ్‌లపై 10% కమీషన్ తీసుకుంటుంది. విక్రేత టీమ్ ను రూ. 100కి విక్రయించినట్లయితే, MPL దానిలో 10% తీసుకుంటుంది, అంటే రూ. 10 మరియు మిగిలిన రూ. 90ని మీ విన్నింగ్స్ క్యాష్ వాలెట్‌లో క్రెడిట్ చేస్తుంది.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Is there any commission charged by MPL in this?
title: क्या इसमें MPL द्वारा कोई कमीशन लिया जाता है?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "हाँ। MPL सेलर से उसके सभी पूरे हुए व्यापारों पर 10% कमीशन लेता है। यदि सेलर ने टीम को 100 रुपये में बेचा है, तो MPL उसमें से 10% लेगी, जो कि 10 रुपये है और बाकी 90 रुपये आपके जीतने वाले कैश वॉलेट में जमा कर देगा।", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How many team(s) can I buy or sell in the match?
title: மேட்ச்சில் எத்தனை டீம்களை நான் வாங்கலாம் அல்லது விற்கலாம்?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "ஒரு மேட்ச்சில் எத்தனை டீம்களை வேண்டுமானாலும் வாங்கலாம்/விற்கலாம்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How many team(s) can I buy or sell in the match?

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Aap ek match mein jitni chahe utni teamon ko kharid/bech sakte hain.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How many team(s) can I buy or sell in the match?

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "మీరు ఒక మ్యాచ్‌లో మీకు కావలసినన్ని టీమ్స్ ను కొనుగోలు చేయవచ్చు/అమ్మవచ్చు.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Can I edit/delete an ask price after I have set it?
title: Can I edit/delete an ask price after I have set it?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Yes. You can edit/delete your ask price. If you are editing the ask price, you can't put an ask price lower than the current bid at that time. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What happens to my purchased/sold team if the match gets cancelled in between?
title: Agar match beech mein hi radd ho jata hai to meri khareedi gayi/bechi gayi team ka kya hoga?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Kisi vishesh contest ke liye live match ke dauraan team bechne wala koi bhi vyakti, match ke beech mein radd ho jane per trade ke maadhyam se jama ki gayi rashi apne pass rakh sakta hai. \nTeam ke leaderboard ki kaisi bhi sthiti ke bavjood yadi match radd ho jata hai, to team khareedne waale vyakti ko us contest ki entry fees ke barabar raashi milegi.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "नहीं। टीम केवल उसी कॉन्टेस्ट के लिए बिकेगी जिसके लिए वह बेची गई थी। आप अभी भी उन अन्य कॉन्टेस्ट्स के लिए उस टीम के मालिक रहेंगे जिनके लिए आपने उस टीम को रजिस्टर किया है।", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How will I know that someone wants to purchase my team?
title: எனது டீமை ஒருவர் வாங்க விரும்புகிறார் என்பதை நான் எப்படி அறிவேன்?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "உங்கள் டீமில் இருக்கும் தற்போதைய ஏலத்தை உங்கள் மேட்ச் பக்கம் மற்றும் லீடர்போர்டு பிரிவில் காண்பீர்கள். டீம் லீடர்போர்டு தரவரிசையில் நீங்கள் அதைக் காண்பீர்கள்.\r\nமேலும், MPL அறிவிப்புகள் உங்களால் முடக்கப்படாவிட்டால், உங்கள் டீமில் ஏலத்தைப் பெறும்போதெல்லாம் MPL உங்களுக்கு அறிவிப்பை அனுப்பும்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Aap apne match page aur leaderboard section mein apni team par vartman mein maujood boli dekh sakte hain. Aap yah team leaderboard rank par dekh sakte hain. Saath hi, jab bhi aap apni team ke liye koi boli prapt karte hain, to agar aapne MPL notification band nahin ki hai, to har bar MPL apko ek suchna bhejega.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "మీ మ్యాచ్ పేజీ మరియు లీడర్‌బోర్డ్ విభాగంలో మీ టీమ్ లో ఉన్న ప్రస్తుత బిడ్‌ని మీరు చూస్తారు. మీరు దానిని టీమ్ లీడర్‌బోర్డ్ ర్యాంక్‌లో చూస్తారు.\r\nఅలాగే, మీరు MPL నోటిఫికేషన్‌లను ఆఫ్ చేయకుంటే, మీరు మీ టీమ్ లో బిడ్‌ను స్వీకరించినప్పుడల్లా MPL మీకు నోటిఫికేషన్‌ను పంపుతుంది.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "நீங்கள் தேர்வு செய்யும் போட்டியில் 1000க்கும் மேற்பட்ட இடங்கள் உள்ளதா என்று பார்க்கவும். 1000க்கும் மேற்பட்ட இடங்களைக் கொண்ட ஒரு போட்டியை நீங்கள் சரிபார்த்தால், நீங்கள் ஒரு குழுவை வாங்க முடியும். போட்டியில் 1000க்கும் மேற்பட்ட இடங்கள் இருந்தால், லைவ் மேட்ச் கார்டில் கிளிக் செய்து 'பிற போட்டிகள்' என்பதன் கீழ் பார்க்கவும், அந்த போட்டிக்கான அணியை நீங்கள் வாங்கக்கூடிய போட்டிகளின் பட்டியலை நீங்கள் பார்க்க வேண்டும்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: I don't see an option to buy other teams? What do I do?
title: मुझे अन्य टीमें खरीदने का विकल्प नहीं दिख रहा है? मैं क्या करूँ?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "कृपया देखें कि, क्या आप जिस कॉन्टेस्ट की टीम चेक कर रहे हैं, उसमें 1000 से अधिक स्लॉट हैं। यदि आप 1000 से अधिक स्लॉट वाले कॉन्टेस्ट को चेक कर रहे हैं, तो आपको टीम खरीदने में सक्षम होना चाहिए। यदि कॉन्टेस्ट में 1000 से अधिक स्लॉट हैं, तो कृपया लाइव मैच कार्ड पर क्लिक करें और 'अन्य कॉन्टेस्ट' में देखें, आपको उन कॉन्टेस्ट की लिस्ट दिखाई देनी चाहिए जिनमें आप उस मैच के लिए टीम खरीद सकते हैं।", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: I don't see an option to buy other teams? What do I do?
title: ఇతర జట్లను కొనుగోలు చేసే ఎంపిక నాకు కనిపించడం లేదే? నేను ఏమి చేయాలి?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "దయచేసి మీరు తనిఖీ చేస్తున్న కంటెస్ట్ టీమ్ లో 1000 కంటే ఎక్కువ స్లాట్‌లు ఉన్నాయో లేదో చూడండి. మీరు 1000 కంటే ఎక్కువ స్లాట్‌లను కలిగి ఉన్న కంటెస్ట్ ను తనిఖీ చేస్తే, మీరు టీమ్ ను కొనుగోలు చేయగలగాలి. పోటీలో 1000 కంటే ఎక్కువ స్లాట్‌లు ఉంటే, దయచేసి లైవ్ మ్యాచ్ కార్డ్‌పై క్లిక్ చేసి, 'ఇతర కంటెస్ట్స్' కింద చూడండి, మీరు ఆ మ్యాచ్ కోసం టీమ్ ను కొనుగోలు చేయగల కంటెస్ట్ ల లిస్ట్ ను చూడాలి.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: I sold my team but I am unable to withdraw the amount that I have received? What do I do?
title: నేను నా టీమ్ ను విక్రయించాను కానీ నేను అందుకున్న మొత్తాన్ని విత్‌డ్రా చేయలేకపోతున్నానా? నేను ఏమి చేయాలి?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "దయచేసి మీరు మీ KYCని పూర్తి చేసారో లేదో చూడండి. మీరు మీ KYCని పూర్తి చేసి, ఇప్పటికీ విత్‌డ్రా చేసుకోలేకపోతే, దయచేసి MPL మద్దతు టీమ్ ను సంప్రదించండి.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: I sold my team but I am unable to withdraw the amount that I have received? What do I do?
title: Maine apni team ko bech diya hai lekin jo raashi mujhe mili hai, main use vidra nahin kar pa rha hoon? Main kya karoon?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Kripaya dekhein ki aapne apna KYC poora kar liya hai ya nahin. Yadi aapne apna KYC poora kar lia hai, aur phir bhi withdraw nahin kar pa rhe hain, to kripaya MPL sahyog team se sampark karein.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/3a5efa97623b4a75a1f728fb900845c7.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "অনুগ্রহ করে IPL চলাকালীন কল ব্রেক ইভেন্টের সময়সূচী চেক করুন।", "titleTwo": "ইভেন্টের সময়সূচী", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b2", "titleTwoPreset": "lb1", "backgroundColor": "tint.orange"}}]}

text: I sold my team but I am unable to withdraw the amount that I have received? What do I do?
title: நான் எனது டீமை விற்றேன், ஆனால் நான் பெற்ற தொகையை என்னால் திரும்பப் பெற முடியவில்லை? நான் என்ன செய்வது?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "உங்கள் KYC ஐ முடித்துவிட்டீர்களா என்று பார்க்கவும். நீங்கள் உங்கள் KYC ஐ முடித்துவிட்டு, இன்னும் திரும்பப் பெற முடியவில்லை என்றால், MPL சப்போர்ட் டீமை தொடர்பு கொள்ளவும்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: I sold my team but I am unable to withdraw the amount that I have received? What do I do?
title: मैंने अपनी टीम को बेच दिया है लेकिन जो राशि मुझे मिली है, मैं उसे विड्रॉ नहीं कर पा रहा हूँ? मैं क्या करूँ?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "कृपया देखें कि आपने अपना KYC को पूरा कर लिया है या नहीं। यदि आपने अपना KYC पूरा कर लिया है, और फिर भी विड्रॉ नहीं कर पा रहे हैं, तो कृपया MPL सहयोग टीम से संपर्क करें।", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Why I am getting an error "Something Looks Fishy"?
title: "ఏదో అనుమాస్పదంగా కనిపిస్తోంది" అనే ఎర్రర్‌ను నేను ఎందుకు పొందుతున్నాను?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "మీరు బిడ్ వేస్తున్నట్లయితే లేదా రూ. 1000 కంటే ఎక్కువ ధరను సెట్ చేస్తున్నట్లయితే, మీ బిడ్ మొత్తం లేదా ఆస్క్ ప్రైస్ మీరు బిడ్ వేయడానికి ప్రయత్నిస్తున్న టీమ్ యొక్క ప్రస్తుత విన్నింగ్స్ కంటే 5 రెట్లు ఎక్కువగా ఉంటే మీరు ఈ ఎర్రర్‌ను పొందవచ్చు.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is the Great Indian Gaming League?
title: গ্রেট ইন্ডিয়ান গেমিং লীগ কি?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "এই ক্রিকেট সিজন MPL আপনার জন্য নিয়ে এসেছে গ্রেট ইন্ডিয়ান গেমিং লীগ (জি.আই.জি.এল), দেশের সবচেয়ে বড় মাল্টি-স্পোর্টস অনলাইন গেমিং ইভেন্ট, যার মোট মূল্য উইনিং হিসাবে 2000 কোটি টাকা 24শে মার্চ থেকে 29শে মে, 2022 পর্যন্ত ফ্যান্টাসি ক্রিকেট, কার্ড গেম; রামি, পোকার, কলব্রেক, মিন্ডি ইত্যাদি এবং নৈমিত্তিক গেম যেমন লুডো, ক্যারাম, পুল ইত্যাদির মতো বিভাগগুলিতে।", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is the Great Indian Gaming League?
title: கிரேட் இந்தியன் கேமிங் லீக் என்றால் என்ன?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "இந்த கிரிக்கெட் சீசன் MPL, நாட்டின் மிகப்பெரிய மல்டி-ஸ்போர்ட் ஆன்லைன் கேமிங் ஈவென்ட்டான கிரேட் இந்தியன் கேமிங் லீக்கை (GIGL) உங்களுக்குக் கொண்டு வருகிறது, இதன் மொத்த மதிப்பு 2022 மார்ச் 24 முதல் மே 29, 2022 வரை ஃபேண்டஸி கிரிக்கெட் போன்ற பிரிவுகளில் ரூ.2000 கோடி பெறுகிறது. கார்டு கேம்; ரம்மி, போக்கர், கால்பிரேக், மிண்டி போன்றவை மற்றும் லுடோ, கேரம், பூல் போன்ற சாதாரண கேம்கள்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is the Great Indian Gaming League?
title: గ్రేట్ ఇండియన్ గేమింగ్ లీగ్ అంటే ఏమిటి?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "ఈ క్రికెట్ సీజన్ MPL ఫాంటసీ క్రికెట్, కార్డ్ గేమ్స్; రమ్మీ, పోకర్, కాల్‌బ్రేక్, మిండి మొదలైనవి మరియు లూడో, క్యారమ్, పూల్ మొదలైన సాధారణ గేమ్‌లువంటి విభాగాల్లో 2022 మార్చి 24 నుండి మే 29 వరకు మొత్తం రూ. 2000 కోట్లతో దేశంలోనే అతిపెద్ద మల్టీ-స్పోర్ట్ ఆన్‌లైన్ గేమింగ్ ఈవెంట్ అయిన గ్రేట్ ఇండియన్ గేమింగ్ లీగ్ (GIGL)ని మీ ముందుకి తీసుకువస్తుంది.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Which games are supported in World War?
title: World War mein kaun se game samarthit hain?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Jin games mein apko score milta hai, unka World War tournament ho sakta hai, lekin hum abhi kuch games mein live hain.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is the Great Indian Gaming League?
title: ग्रेट इंडियन गेमिंग लीग क्या है?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "इस क्रिकेट सीज़न MPL आपके लिए ला रहा है देश का सबसे बड़ा मल्टी-स्पोर्ट ऑनलाइन गेमिंग इवेंट, ग्रेट इंडियन गेमिंग लीग (GIGL), जिसमें फैंटेसी क्रिकेट, कार्ड गेम्स, रमी, पोकर, कॉलब्रेक, मिंडी इत्यादि और लूडो, कैरम, पूल जैसे कैज़ुअल गेम्स की सभी श्रेणियों में 24 मार्च से 29 मई, 2022 तक जीत के रूप में कुल 2000 करोड़ रुपये मूल्य है।", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is the Great Indian Gaming League?
title: Great Indian Gaming League kya hai?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Is cricket season MPL aapke liye la rha hai desh ka sabse bada multi-sport online gaming event, Great Indian Gaming League (GIGL), jisme Fantasy Cricket, Card Games, Rummy, Poker, Callbreak, Mindi ityaadi aur Ludo, Carrom, Pool jaise Casual Games ki sabhi shreniyon mein 24 March say 29 May, 2022 tak jeet ke roop mein kul 2000 Crore Rupaye mulya hai.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What are tasks for rewards events?
title: రివార్డ్ ఈవెంట్‌ల కోసం టాస్క్‌లు ఏమిటి?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "టాస్క్‌లు అనేవి మీరు ప్లాట్‌ఫారమ్‌లో చేయగల మరియు డబ్బు సంపాదించగల సాధారణ కార్యకలాపాలు. ఉదాహరణకు, మీరు ‘మీ మొదటి రమ్మీ గేమ్ ఆడటం ద్వారా రూ.3 గెలవండి’ అనే టాస్క్‌ని చూస్తే, మీరు మొదటి రమ్మీ గేమ్ ఆడిన వెంటనే మీ వాలెట్‌లో ఈ మొత్తాన్ని అందుకుంటారు. దీని గురించి మరిన్ని వివరాల కోసం దయచేసి MPL హెల్ప్‌డెస్క్ పేజీలోని మా సహాయ వర్గాలలోని “రివార్డ్‌ల కోసం టాస్క్‌లు” విభాగాన్ని సందర్శించండి.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What are tasks for rewards events?
title: রিওয়ার্ড ইভেন্টগুলির জন্য কি কি টাস্ক আছে?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "টাস্ক হল সাধারণ ক্রিয়াকলাপ যা আপনি প্ল্যাটফর্মে করতে পারেন এবং অর্থ উপার্জন করতে পারেন। উদাহরণস্বরূপ, আপনি যদি দেখেন ‘আপনার প্রথম রামি গেম খেলে .3 টাকা জিতুন’ নামক একটি টাস্ক, আপনি প্রথম রামি গেমটি খেলার সাথে সাথেই আপনার ওয়ালেটে এই রাশিটি পাবেন। এই বিষয়ে আরও বিশদ বিবরণের জন্য অনুগ্রহ করে MPL হেল্পডেস্ক পেজে আমাদের সহায়তা বিভাগগুলিতে \"রিওয়ার্ডের জন্য টাস্ক\" বিভাগে যান৷", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What are tasks for rewards events?
title: Reward events ke liye tasks kya hain?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Task saral gatividhiyan hain jo aap platform per khel sakte hain aur paise kamaa sakte hain. Udaharan ke liye, agar aap ‘Apna pehla rummy game khelkar 3 rupaye jeetein' naam ka ek task dekhte hain, to pehle rummy game khelne ke turant baad hi aapko aapke wallet mein yeh rashi prapt ho jayegi. Is bare mein adhik jankari ke liye kripaya MPL helpdesk prishth par hamari sahayata shreniyon mein \"Tasks for Rewards\" anubhag pr jayein.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What are tasks for rewards events?
title: ரிவார்டுகள் நிகழ்வுகளுக்கான பணிகள் என்ன?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "பணிகள் என்பது நீங்கள் மேடையில் செய்து பணம் சம்பாதிக்கக்கூடிய எளிய செயல்கள். உதாரணமாக, ‘உங்கள் முதல் ரம்மி கேமை விளையாடி ரூ.3-ஐ வெல்லுங்கள்’ என்ற டாஸ்க்கைப் பார்த்தால், முதல் ரம்மி கேமை விளையாடிய உடனேயே இந்தத் தொகை உங்கள் வாலட்டில் கிடைக்கும். இதைப் பற்றிய கூடுதல் விவரங்களுக்கு, MPL ஹெல்ப்டெஸ்க் பக்கத்தில் உள்ள எங்கள் உதவி வகைகளில் \"ரிவார்டுகளுக்கான பணிகள்\" பகுதியைப் பார்வையிடவும்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What are tasks for rewards events?
title: रिवॉर्ड ईवेंट्स  के लिए टास्क्स क्या हैं?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "टास्क सरल गतिविधियां हैं जो आप प्लैटफ़ॉर्म पर खेल सकते हैं और पैसे कमा सकते हैं। उदाहरण के लिए, अगर आप ‘अपना पहला रमी गेम खेलकर .3 रुपये जीतें' नाम का एक टास्क देखते हैं, तो पहले रमी गेम खेलने के तुरंत बाद ही आपको आपके वॉलेट में यह राशि प्राप्त हो जाएगी। इस बारे में अधिक जानकारी के लिए कृपया MPL हेल्पडेस्क पृष्ठ पर  हमारी सहायता श्रेणियों में \"टास्क्स फ़ॉर रिवार्ड्स\" अनुभाग पर जाएँ।", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/db6e650637b042f4b96a5e624a198f7c.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "నేషనల్ లూడో సిరీస్ అనేది లూడోలో ఏప్రిల్ 1-16 (ఏప్రిల్ 16 ఫైనల్) మధ్య 16 రోజుల ఈవెంట్, ఇక్కడ ప్రతిరోజూ 10AM-10PM మధ్య పనితీరు ఆధారంగా వివిధ లాబీల్లో టాప్ 5 ర్యాంకింగ్ ప్లేయర్‌లకు ఏప్రిల్ 1-15 మధ్య టిక్కెట్లు అందించబడతాయి. ఈ టిక్కెట్‌లతో, వినియోగదారులు టాప్ 2000 ర్యాంకర్‌లకు 50లక్షల వరకు రివార్డులతో ఏప్రిల్ 16న గ్రాండ్ ఫినాలేలో పోటీపడతారు.", "titleTwo": "టిక్కెట్ పంపిణీ", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b2", "titleTwoPreset": "b2", "backgroundColor": "tint.yellow"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/af26eb602860401cb586c36b86b1a445.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "ఏప్రిల్ 16న - ఫైనల్ MBA రూపంలో 50 రూపాయల లాబీగా జరుగుతుంది - ఇక్కడ వినియోగదారులు పోటీలో పాల్గొనడానికి సేకరించిన టిక్కెట్‌లను ఉపయోగించవచ్చు లేదా పోటీలో ప్రవేశించడానికి రూ. 50 ఫీజు చెల్లించవచ్చు. అత్యధిక గేమ్‌లను గెలుచుకున్న టాప్ 2000 మంది వినియోగదారులకి క్రింది బహుమతులు అందజేయబడతాయి.", "titleTwo": "బహుమతి పంపిణీ", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b2", "titleTwoPreset": "b2", "backgroundColor": "tint.yellow"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/6afe81dd57694a17a6d9c7861afe800d.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "నేషనల్ లూడో సిరీస్ యొక్క అదే ఫార్మాట్ మేలో అంటే మే 10 నుండి మే 28 వరకు (మే 28 ఫైనల్) నిర్వహించబడుతుంది", "titleTwo": "నేషనల్ లుడో సిరీస్ బహుమతులు", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b2", "titleTwoPreset": "b2", "backgroundColor": "tint.orange"}}]}

text: What is the National Ludo series and the associated reward?
title: জাতীয় লুডো সিরিজ এবং সংশ্লিষ্ট রিওয়ার্ডগুলি কি?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/db6e650637b042f4b96a5e624a198f7c.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "জাতীয় লুডো সিরিজটি লুডোতে 1-16 এপ্রিল (16ই এপ্রিল ফাইনাল) এর মধ্যে 16 দিনের ইভেন্ট যেখানে প্রতিদিন 1-15 এপ্রিল টিকিটের মধ্যে সকাল 10টা থেকে রাত 10 টার মধ্যে বিভিন্ন লবির খেলার উপর ভিত্তি করে বিভিন্ন 5 র‌্যাঙ্কিং খেলোয়াড়দেরকে সর্বোচ্চ র‌্যাঙ্কিং প্লেয়ারদের পুরস্কৃত করা হবে। এই টিকিটগুলির সাথে, ইউজাররা 16ই এপ্রিল তারিখে শীর্ষ 2000 র‌্যাঙ্কারদের জন্য 50লক্ষ পর্যন্ত রিওয়ার্ড সহ গ্র্যান্ড ফাইনালে প্রতিযোগিতা করবে।", "titleTwo": "টিকিট বিতরণ", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b2", "titleTwoPreset": "b2", "backgroundColor": "tint.yellow"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/af26eb602860401cb586c36b86b1a445.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "16ই এপ্রিলে - সমাপনী MBA আকারে 50 টাকা লবি হিসাবে অনুষ্ঠিত হবে - যেখানে ইউজাররা প্রতিযোগিতায় প্রবেশের জন্য সংগৃহীত টিকিটগুলি ব্যবহার করতে পারেন বা কনটেস্টে প্রবেশের জন্য 50 টাকা ফি দিতে পারেন৷ সর্বোচ্চ 2000 জন ইউজার সর্বোচ্চ গেম জিতেছে তাদেরকে নিম্নলিখিত পুরস্কারে ভূষিত করা হবে।", "titleTwo": "পুরস্কার বিতরণ", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b2", "titleTwoPreset": "b2", "backgroundColor": "tint.yellow"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/6afe81dd57694a17a6d9c7861afe800d.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "জাতীয় লুডো সিরিজের একই ফর্ম্যাটে মে মাসে অর্থাৎ 10 মে থেকে 28 মে (28 মে ফাইনাল) এর মধ্যে হোস্ট করা হবে", "titleTwo": "জাতীয় লুডো সিরিজের পুরস্কার", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b2", "titleTwoPreset": "b2", "backgroundColor": "tint.orange"}}]}

text: What is the National Ludo series and the associated reward?
title: राष्ट्रीय लूडो श्रृंखला और संबद्ध रिवॉर्ड क्या है?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/db6e650637b042f4b96a5e624a198f7c.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "राष्ट्रीय लूडो श्रृंखला 16 दिन का एक इवेंट है जो 1-16 अप्रैल (16 अप्रैल फ़िनाले) के बीच होता है, जहां 1 से 15 अप्रैल  के बीच प्रतिदिन सुबह के 10 बजे से रात के 10 बजे तक विभिन्न लॉबीज़ के प्रदर्शन के आधार पर 5 टॉप रैंकिंग प्लेयर्स को टिकट प्रदान किए जाएंगे। इन टिकटों के साथ, उपयोगकर्ता 16 अप्रैल को ग्रैंड फ़िनाले में टॉप 2000 रैंकर्स के साथ 50L तक के रिवार्ड्स के लिए लड़ेंगे।", "titleTwo": "टिकट वितरण", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b2", "titleTwoPreset": "b2", "backgroundColor": "tint.yellow"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/af26eb602860401cb586c36b86b1a445.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "16 अप्रैल को फ़िनाले 50 रुपये की लॉबी के रूप में MBA के रूप में होगा - जहां उपयोगकर्ता प्रतियोगिता में प्रवेश करने के लिए एकत्र किए गए टिकट का उपयोग कर सकते हैं या प्रतियोगिता में प्रवेश करने के लिए 50 रुपये की फ़ीस का भुगतान कर सकते हैं। सबसे ज़्यादा गेम जीतने वाले टॉप 2000 उपयोगकर्ताओं को निम्नलिखित पुरस्कारों के साथ सम्मानित किया जाएगा। ", "titleTwo": "प्राइज़ डिस्ट्रिब्यूशन", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b2", "titleTwoPreset": "b2", "backgroundColor": "tint.yellow"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/6afe81dd57694a17a6d9c7861afe800d.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "राष्ट्रीय लूडो श्रृंखला का ऐसा ही \tफ़ॉर्मेट मई में, 10 मई से 28 मई तक (28 मई को फ़िनाले) होस्ट किया जाएगा।", "titleTwo": "राष्ट्रीय लूडो श्रृंखला प्राइज़ेज़ ", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b2", "titleTwoPreset": "b2", "backgroundColor": "tint.orange"}}]}

text: What is the National Ludo series and the associated reward?
title: தேசிய லுடோ தொடர் மற்றும் அதனுடன் தொடர்புடைய ரிவார்டு என்றால் என்ன?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/db6e650637b042f4b96a5e624a198f7c.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "லூடோவில் ஏப்ரல் 1 முதல் 16 வரை (ஏப்ரல் 16ஆம் தேதி இறுதிப் போட்டி) தேசிய லூடோ தொடர் 16 நாள் நிகழ்வாகும், இங்கு ஏப்ரல் 1 முதல் 15 வரை தினமும் காலை 10 மணி முதல் இரவு 10 மணி வரையிலான செயல்திறன் அடிப்படையில் பல்வேறு லாபிகளில் முதல் 5 தரவரிசை பிளேயர்களுக்கு டிக்கெட்டுகள் வழங்கப்படும். இந்த டிக்கெட்டுகளுடன், முதல் 2000 தரவரிசையாளர்களுக்கு 50L வரை ரிவார்டுகளுடன் ஏப்ரல் 16 ஆம் தேதி நடைபெறும் இறுதிப் போட்டியில் பயனர்கள் போட்டியிடுவார்கள்.", "titleTwo": "டிக்கெட் விநியோகம்", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b2", "titleTwoPreset": "b2", "backgroundColor": "tint.yellow"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/af26eb602860401cb586c36b86b1a445.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "ஏப்ரல் 16 ஆம் தேதி - இறுதிப் போட்டி MBA வடிவத்தில் 50 ரூபாய் லாபியாக நடைபெறும் - இதில் பயனர்கள் சேகரிக்கப்பட்ட டிக்கெட்டுகளைப் பயன்படுத்தி போட்டியில் பங்கேற்கலாம் அல்லது போட்டியில் கலந்துகொள்ள ரூ.50 ஃபீ செலுத்தலாம். அதிக கேம்களை வென்ற முதல் 2000 பயனர்களுக்கு பின்வரும் பரிசுகள் வழங்கப்படும்.", "titleTwo": "பிரைஸ் டிஸ்ட்ரிபியூஷன்", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b2", "titleTwoPreset": "b2", "backgroundColor": "tint.yellow"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/6afe81dd57694a17a6d9c7861afe800d.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "நேஷனல் லூடோ தொடரின் அதே ஃபார்மட் மே மாதத்தில் அதாவது மே 10 முதல் மே 28 வரை (மே 28 இறுதிப் போட்டி) ஹோஸ்ட் செய்யப்படும்.", "titleTwo": "தேசிய லூடோ தொடர் பரிசுகள்", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b2", "titleTwoPreset": "b2", "backgroundColor": "tint.orange"}}]}

text: What are Tasks for Rewards?
title: रिवॉर्ड के लिए टास्क क्या हैं?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "टास्क आसान गतिविधियाँ हैं जिन्हें आप प्लेटफ़ॉर्म पर कर सकते हैं और पैसा कमा सकते हैं। जैसे कि, अगर आप 'अपना पहला रमी गेम खेलकर .3 रुपये जीतें' नाम का टास्क देखते हैं, तो आपको यह राशि पहला रमी गेम खेलने के तुरंत बाद आपके वॉलेट में मिल जाएगी।", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What are Tasks for Rewards?
title: రివార్డ్‌ల కోసం టాస్క్‌లు ఏవి?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "టాస్క్‌లు అనేవి మీరు ప్లాట్‌ఫారమ్‌లో చేయగల మరియు డబ్బు సంపాదించగల సాధారణ కార్యకలాపాలు.\r\nఉదాహరణకు, మీరు ‘మీ మొదటి రమ్మీ గేమ్ ఆడటం ద్వారా రూ..3 గెలవండి’ అనే టాస్క్‌ని చూసినట్లయితే, మీరు మొదటి రమ్మీ గేమ్ ఆడిన వెంటనే మీ వాలెట్‌లో ఈ మొత్తాన్ని అందుకుంటారు.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What are Tasks for Rewards?
title: ரிவார்டுகளுக்கான பணிகள் என்ன?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "பணிகள் என்பது நீங்கள் மேடையில் செய்து பணம் சம்பாதிக்கக்கூடிய எளிய செயல்கள்.\r\nஉதாரணமாக, ‘உங்கள் முதல் ரம்மி விளையாட்டை விளையாடி ரூ.3-ஐ வெல்லுங்கள்’ என்ற டாஸ்க்கைப் பார்த்தால், முதல் ரம்மி கேமை விளையாடிய உடனேயே இந்தத் தொகை உங்கள் வாலட்டில் கிடைக்கும்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What are Tasks for Rewards?
title: Rewards ke liye Task kya hai?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Task asaan gatividhiyan hain jinhein aap is platform par khel sakte hain aur paisa kama sakte hain. \nJaise ki, agar apko 'apna pahla rummy game khelkar .3 Rupaye jitein' naam ka task dikhta hai, to apko aapka pehla rummy game khelne ke turant baad yah raashi aapke wallet mein mil jayegi.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Where can I see my tasks?
title: నేను నా టాస్క్‌లను ఎక్కడ చూడగలను?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "మీరు టాస్క్‌కు అర్హత కలిగి ఉంటే, మీరు వాటిని హోమ్ స్క్రీన్‌లో విడ్జెట్‌లో వీక్షించగలరు. మీరు ‘అన్ని టాస్క్‌లు’పై క్లిక్ చేయడం ద్వారా అందుబాటులో ఉన్న అన్ని టాస్క్‌ల లిస్ట్ ను చెక్ చేయవచ్చు.  ఈ విభాగంలో యాక్టివ్ మరియు పూర్తయిన టాస్క్‌లు కనిపిస్తాయి.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How can I check the progress of my tasks?
title: मैं अपने टास्क की प्रोग्रेस को कैसे चेक कर सकता हूँ?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "आप होम स्क्रीन पर विजेट में या 'सभी टास्क' पेज में टास्क की डीटेल में अपने टास्क की प्रोग्रेस को ट्रैक कर सकते हैं। प्रोग्रेस को ट्रैक करने में कोई भी दिक्कत आने पर, कृपया फिर से चेक करें कि गतिविधि टास्क से जुड़ी है या नहीं या फिर MPL हेल्पडेस्क से सम्पर्क करें।", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What are key Rummy events during IPL 2022?
title: IPL 2022 இன் போது முக்கிய ரம்மி நிகழ்வுகள் என்ன?

text: Where can I see my tasks?
title: எனது பணிகளை நான் எங்கே பார்க்கலாம்?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "நீங்கள் ஒரு பணிக்குத் தகுதி பெற்றிருந்தால், அவற்றை ஹோம் ஸ்கிரீனில் விட்ஜெட்டில் பார்க்க முடியும். 'அனைத்து பணிகளும்' என்பதைக் கிளிக் செய்வதன் மூலம் கிடைக்கக்கூடிய அனைத்து பணிகளின் பட்டியலை நீங்கள் சரிபார்க்கலாம். செயலில் மற்றும் முடிக்கப்பட்ட பணிகள் இந்தப் பிரிவில் தெரியும்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Where can I see my tasks?
title: Main apne task kahan dekh sakta hoon?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Agar aap kisi task ke liye eligible hain, to aap unhein home screen par ek widget mein dekh payenge. Aap 'Sabhi Tasks' par click karke sabhi uplabdh tasks ki list check kar sakte hain. Is section mein apko active aur poore hue task dikhayi denge.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Where can I see my tasks?
title: मैं अपने टास्क कहाँ देख सकता हूँ?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "अगर आप किसी टास्क के लिए एलिजिबल हैं, तो आप उन्हें होम स्क्रीन पर एक विजेट में देख पाएंगे। आप 'सभी टास्क' पर क्लिक करके सभी उपलब्ध टास्कों की लिस्ट चेक कर सकते हैं। इस सेक्शन में आपको ऐक्टिव और पूरे हुए टास्क दिखाई देंगे।", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How can I check the progress of my tasks?
title: Main apne tasks ki progress ko kaise check kar sakta hoon?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Aap home screen par widget mein ya 'Sabhi task' page mein task detail ke andar apne task ki progress ko track kar sakte hain. Progress ko track karne mein koi bhi dikkat aane par, kripaya phir se check karein ki gatividhi task se judi hai ya nahin ya phir MPL helpdesk se sampark karein.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How can I start a task?
title: నేను ఒక టాస్క్‌ను ఎలా ప్రారంభించగలను?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "మీరు టాస్క్‌ను దాని ప్రక్కన ఉన్న యాక్షన్ బటన్‌పై క్లిక్ చేయడం ద్వారా ప్రారంభించవచ్చు, ఇది టాస్క్‌ను పూర్తి చేయడానికి లేదా యాప్ ద్వారా నావిగేట్ చేస్తున్నప్పుడు అదే చర్యను చేయడం ద్వారా, మిమ్మల్ని సంబంధిత స్క్రీన్‌కి మళ్లిస్తుంది.\r\nఉదాహరణకు, 'ప్లే ఎ గేమ్' టాస్క్‌ను 'ఇప్పుడే ప్లే చేయి'పై క్లిక్ చేసి, ఆపై స్వయంచాలకంగా ప్రారంభించబడిన గేమ్‌ను ప్లే చేయడం ద్వారా లేదా హోమ్ స్క్రీన్‌లో ఏదైనా గేమ్ టైల్‌ని ఎంచుకుని గేమ్ ఆడటం ద్వారా పూర్తి చేయవచ్చు.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How can I start a task?
title: Main kisi task ko kaise shuru kar sakta hoon?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Aap iske saath sthit action button par click karke task shuru kar sakte hain, jo apko task ko pura karne ke liye isse judi screen par redirect karega ya app ke madhyam se navigate karte samay waise hi action karega. \nJaise ki, 'Ek game khelen' task ko 'Abhi khelen' par click karke aur phir swachaalit roop se launch hone waale game ko khelkar ya home screen mein kisi game tile ko chunkar aur game khelkar ise pura kiya ja sakta hai.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How can I start a task?
title: मैं किसी टास्क को कैसे शुरू कर सकता हूँ?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "आप इसके आगे एक्शन बटन पर क्लिक करके टास्क शुरू कर सकते हैं, जो आपको टास्क पूरा करने के लिए इससे जुड़ी स्क्रीन पर रीडायरेक्ट करेगा या ऐप के माध्यम से नेविगेट करते समय एक ही क्रिया करके। जैसे कि, 'एक गेम खेलें' टास्क को 'अभी खेलें' पर क्लिक करके और फिर स्वचालित रूप से लॉन्च होने वाले गेम को खेलकर या होम स्क्रीन में किसी गेम टाइल का चयन करके और गेम खेलकर पूरा किया जा सकता है।", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is Winnings Cash?
title: What is Winnings Cash?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Winning cash is the cash you have won inside the MPL app. You can withdrawal this cash anytime to your Bank Account, or use this money to play on the MPL app.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How can I start a task?
title: ஒரு பணியை நான் எவ்வாறு தொடங்குவது?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "அதற்கு அடுத்துள்ள செயல் பட்டனைக் கிளிக் செய்வதன் மூலம் நீங்கள் ஒரு பணியைத் தொடங்கலாம், இது பணியை முடிக்க தொடர்புடைய ஸ்கிரீனிற்கு உங்களைத் திருப்பிவிடும் அல்லதுஆப் இன் மூலம் செல்லும்போது அதே செயலைச் செய்வதன் மூலம்.\r\nஎடுத்துக்காட்டாக, ‘இப்போது விளையாடு’ என்பதைக் கிளிக் செய்து, தானாகவே தொடங்கப்படும் கேமை விளையாடுவதன் மூலமோ அல்லது ஹோம் ஸ்கிரீனில் ஏதேனும் கேம் டைலைத் தேர்ந்தெடுத்து விளையாடுவதன் மூலமோ ‘ஒரு கேமை விளையாடு' பணியை முடிக்க முடியும்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How to play Call Break?
title: कॉल ब्रेक कसा खेळायचा?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": ""प्रत्येक प्लेअरने राउंड स्टार्टिंग करण्यापूर्वी जिंकण्याची अपेक्षा असलेल्या ट्रिक्सची संख्या घोषित करणे आवश्यक आहे. कोणतीही राउंड खेळताना, प्रत्येक प्लेअरने खालील ऑर्डरने कार्ड टाकणे आवश्यक आहे:

 - उच्च रॅंक लीड सूट कार्ड थ्रो करा

 - कोणतेही लीड सूट कार्ड थ्रो करा

 - ट्रम्प सूट कार्ड थ्रो करा

 - कोणतेही सूट कार्ड थ्रो करा


 प्रत्येक ट्रिक्स त्या राउंड मध्ये थ्रो केलेल्या सर्वोच्च रँक कार्डद्वारे जिंंकले जाते, आणि सर्व राऊंडमध्ये स्पेड्स हा डीफॉल्ट ट्रम्प आहे.
   
गेम तपशीलवार समजून घेण्यासाठी, कृपया येथे क्लिक करा."", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}, {"type": "VIDEO", "details": {"title": " ", "videoSrc": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/acf9b9c7e0df4b86a78c4a623fb676ed.mp4", "titlePreset": "s1", "thumbnailSrc": "", "titleTextColor": "black"}}]}

text: How can I check the progress of my tasks?
title: నా పనుల పురోగతిని నేను ఎలా చెక్ చేయగలను?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "మీరు హోమ్ స్క్రీన్‌లోని విడ్జెట్‌లోని టాస్క్ వివరాల క్రింద లేదా 'అన్ని టాస్క్‌లు' పేజీలో మీ టాస్క్ పురోగతిని ట్రాక్ చేయవచ్చు. ప్రోగ్రెస్‌ని ట్రాక్ చేయడంలో ఏవైనా సమస్యలు ఎదురైతే, దయచేసి కార్యకలాపానికి సంబంధించిన కార్యాచరణ ఉందో లేదో మళ్లీ తనిఖీ చేయండి లేదా MPL హెల్ప్‌డెస్క్‌ని సంప్రదించండి.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How can I check the progress of my tasks?
title: எனது பணிகளின் முன்னேற்றத்தை நான் எவ்வாறு சரிபார்க்கலாம்?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "முகப்புத் திரையில் உள்ள விட்ஜெட்டில் உள்ள பணி விவரங்களின் கீழ் அல்லது 'அனைத்து பணிகளும்' பக்கத்தில் உங்கள் பணியின் முன்னேற்றத்தைக் கண்காணிக்கலாம். முன்னேற்றத்தைக் கண்காணிப்பதில் ஏதேனும் சிக்கல்கள் இருந்தால், அந்தச் செயல்பாடு பணிக்குத் தொடர்புடையதா என்பதை மீண்டும் சரிபார்க்கவும் அல்லது MPL ஹெல்ப் டெஸ்கைத் தொடர்பு கொள்ளவும்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: When will I get the reward for the completed task?
title: పూర్తి చేసిన టాస్క్ కు నేను ఎప్పుడు రివార్డ్ పొందగలను?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "పని పూర్తయిన తర్వాత మీరు కమ్యూనికేషన్‌ను స్వీకరిస్తారు మరియు మొత్తం వెంటనే వాలెట్‌కు క్రెడిట్ చేయబడుతుంది. ఏవైనా సమస్యలు ఉంటే, దయచేసి కార్యకలాపానికి సంబంధించిన కార్యాచరణ ఉందో లేదో మళ్లీ చెక్ చేయండి లేదా MPL హెల్ప్‌డెస్క్‌ని సంప్రదించండి.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: When will I get my winnings?
title: When will I get my winnings?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Once your opponent has played the game, we will publish the game result and give out the winnings based on the highest score. In case, your opponent does not play, your entry fee will be refunded.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: When will I get the reward for the completed task?
title: கம்ப்ளீட்டட் டாஸ்கிற்க்கான ரிவார்டை நான் எப்போது பெறுவேன்?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "பணி முடிந்ததும் நீங்கள் தகவல்தொடர்புகளைப் பெறுவீர்கள் மற்றும் தொகை உடனடியாக வாலட்டில் வரவு வைக்கப்படும். ஏதேனும் சிக்கல்கள் ஏற்பட்டால், செயல்பாடு பணிக்கு தொடர்புடையதா என்பதை மீண்டும் சரிபார்க்கவும் அல்லது MPL ஹெல்ப் டெஸ்க்கை அணுகவும்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: When will I get the reward for the completed task?
title: मुझे पूरे किए गए टास्क का रिवॉर्ड कब मिलेगा?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "टास्क पूरा होने के बाद आपको संपर्क किया जाएगा और राशि तुरंत वॉलेट में जमा कर दी जाएगी। कोई भी दिक्कत आने पर, कृपया फिर से चेक कर लें कि गतिविधि टास्क से सुसंगत है या फिर MPL हेल्पडेस्क से संपर्क करें।", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: When will I get the reward for the completed task?
title: Mujhe poore kiye gaye task ka reward kab milega?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Task pura hone ke baad aapko sampark kiya jaayega aur raashi turant wallet mein jama kar di jayegi. Koi bhi dikkat aane par, kripya phir se check kar lein ki gatividhi task se susangat hai ya phir MPL helpdesk se sampark karein.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Can I withdraw the reward amount?
title: Kya main reward ki rashi withdraw kar sakta hoon?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Yah credit kiye gaye reward ke prakar par nirbhar karta hai. Agar aapko kisi task ke liye winning cash milta hai, to aap use withdraw kar sakte hain. Yadi aap deposit cash prapt karte hain, to aap ise cash game khelne ke liye upyog kar sakte hain.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How’s the prize distributed among the players in Single Entry Format?
title: సింగిల్ ఎంట్రీ ఫార్మాట్‌లో ప్లేయర్‌ల మధ్య బహుమతి ఎలా పంపిణీ చేయబడుతుంది?

title: કોલ બ્રેકમાં સ્કોરની ગણતરી કેવી રીતે કરવામાં આવે છે?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": ""જો તમે કરેલા કોલની સમાન બધી યુક્તિઓ જીતો છો, તો તમને 1 પોઈન્ટ મળશે. જો તમે કરેલા કોલ કરતાં વધુ યુક્તિઓ જીતો છો, તો તમને દરેક વધારાની યુક્તિ માટે કોલની સમકક્ષ પોઈન્ટ + 0.1 પોઈન્ટ મળશે. જો તમે કરેલા કોલ કરતાં ઓછી યુક્તિઓ જીતો છો. તમને કરેલા કોલની બરાબર નેગેટિવ સ્કોર મળે છે. 
ઉદાહરણ: 
1) પ્લેયર A 2 યુક્તિઓ બોલાવે છે, અને 2 યુક્તિઓ જીતે છે, પછી 2 પોઈન્ટ આપવામાં આવે છે. 
2) પ્લેયર B 2 યુક્તિઓ બોલાવે છે અને જીતે છે 
5 યુક્તિઓ, પછી 2.3 પોઈન્ટ્સ (કોલ માટે 2 પોઈન્ટ અને દરેક વધારાની યુક્તિ માટે + 0.1 પોઈન્ટ) આપવામાં આવે છે. 
3) પ્લેયર C 2 યુક્તિઓ બોલાવે છે, અને 1 યુક્તિ જીતે છે, પછી -2 પોઈન્ટ આપવામાં આવે છે"", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

title: Call Break -இல் ஸ்கோர்கள் எவ்வாறு கணக்கிடப்படுகின்றன?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": ""மேற்கொள்ளபட்ட காலுக்கு சமமான அனைத்து ட்ரிக்ஸ்களையும் நீங்கள் வென்றால், நீங்கள் 1 பாயிண்ட் பெறுவீர்கள். மேற்கொள்ளப்பட்ட காலைக் காட்டிலும் நீங்கள் அதிக ட்ரிக்ஸை வென்றால், ஒவ்வொரு கூடுதல் ட்ரிக்ஸ்களுக்கு +0.1 பாயிண்ட்களை கால் செய்வதற்கு சமமான பாயிண்ட்களை பெறுவீர்கள். மேற்கொள்ளப்பட்ட காலைக் காட்டிலும் நீங்கள் குறைந்த ட்ரிக்ஸை வென்றால், மேற்கொள்ளப்பட்ட காலுக்கு சமமான நெகட்டிவ் ஸ்கோரை நீங்கள் பெறுவீர்கள். உதாரணம்:
1) பிளேயர் A 2 ட்ரிக்ஸை கோரி, 2 ட்ரிக்ஸை வெல்கிறார், அவருக்கு 2 பாயிண்ட்கள் வழங்கப்படுகின்றன.
2) பிளேயர் B 2 ட்ரிக்ஸை கோரி, 5 டிரிக்ஸை வெல்கிறார், பின்னர் 2.3 பாயிண்ட்கள் (காலுக்கான 2 பாயிண்ட்கள் மற்றும் ஒவ்வொரு ட்ரிக்கிற்கும் +0.1 பாயிண்ட்கள்) வழங்கப்படும்
3) பிளேயர் C 2 ட்ரிக்ஸை கோரி, 1 ட்ரிக்கை வென்றால், -2 பாயிண்ட்கள் வழங்கப்படும்"", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How are scores calculated in Call Break?
title: कॉल ब्रेकमध्ये स्कोअर कसे मोजले जातात?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": ""आपण केलेल्या कॉलच्या बरोबरीने सर्व ट्रिक्स जिंकल्यास, आपल्याला 1 पॉइंट मिळेल. आपण केलेल्या कॉलपेक्षा जास्त युक्त्या जिंकल्यास, आपल्याला प्रत्येक अतिरिक्त ट्रिक्ससाठी कॉलच्या बरोबरीचे पॉइंट्स + 0.1 पॉइंट्स मिळतील, आपण केलेल्या कॉलपेक्षा कमी ट्रिक्स जिंकल्यास, आपण केलेल्या कॉलच्या बरोबरीने मायनस स्कोअर मिळेल.
उदाहरण:
1) प्लेअर A 2 ट्रिक्स कॉल करतो, आणि 2 ट्रिक्स जिंकतो, नंतर 2 पॉइंट्स दिले जातात. 
2) प्लेअर B ने 2 ट्रिक्स केल्या, आणि 5 ट्रिक्स जिंकल्या, नंतर 2.3 पॉइंट्स (कॉलसाठी 2 पॉइंट्स, आणि प्रत्येक अतिरिक्त ट्रिक्ससाठी +0.1 पॉइंट्स) दिले जातात. 
3) प्लेअर C 2 ट्रिक्स कॉल करतो आणि 1 ट्रिक्स जिंकतो, नंतर -2 पॉइंट्स दिले जातात"", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "દરેક ટુર્નામેન્ટમાં એક ચોક્કસ પ્રવેશ ફી હોય છે જે તમારે તેમાં જોઈન થવા માટે ચૂકવવાની જરૂર હોય છે. એવી ટુર્નામેન્ટ પણ છે જ્યાં પ્રવેશ ફી ચોક્કસ સંખ્યામાં ટોકન્સ તરીકે નિર્દિષ્ટ કરવામાં આવે છે. તમે દરેક ટુર્નામેન્ટના નામની આગળ અને ટુર્નામેન્ટના નામ પર ક્લિક કરીને પણ ટુર્નામેન્ટ માટેની એન્ટ્રી ફી ચેક કરી શકો છો.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/d47c697b1ca04eaeab44b7247de3da32.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "કોન્ટેસ્ટમાં પ્રવેશ ફીનો ઉલ્લેખ કરવામાં આવશે", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}]}

text: Why has my Prize Money not been disbursed yet?
title: Why has my Prize Money not been disbursed yet?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Prizes are disbursed only after the final leaderboard is computed. Our systems ensure data correctness so usually the final leaderboard is computed after 15-20 mins of the Contest End Time. Hence, disbursal might take up to 60 mins after the end of the contest. Requesting you to kindly wait a few more mins in case the prizes haven't been disbursed\nYou can check disbursal status under contest info and under your transaction history.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Why are the returns in score calculation not matching with the returns given on any other public website?
title: Why are the returns in score calculation not matching with the returns given on any other public website?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Please be assured our returns are calculated using real-time, actual data from reliable vendors during market hours.
Please note that we use the price of the crypto coin / security exactly at the start time of the contest and exactly at the end time of the contest

Example : Contest Time 9:15 am - 3:30 pm
Then, Return =  [(Price of the crypto coin or stock at 3:30 pm )/ (Price of the crypto coin or stock at 9:15 am) - 1 ] x 100", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Your Fantasy winnings will be transferred to your MPL Wallet when the contest ends, and your portfolio is in the winning zone of the leaderboard. Go to your MPL Wallet and tap on ‘Withdraw’ to withdraw your winnings.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Is it legal to play Fantasy Games?
title: Is it legal to play Fantasy Games?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Yes! Fantasy Crypto & Stocks is a 'Game of Skill'.\nA game of skill is a game, contest, or amusement of any format in which the outcome is determined mainly by mental or physical skill, rather than chance. Games of skills are legal across India except for Assam, Nagaland, Odisha, Sikkim, and Telangana.\nDue to the state laws of Assam, Nagaland, Odisha, Sikkim, and Telangana states, a person is not allowed to play Game of Skills with prize money involved. If you are from these 5 states then it is illegal to be part of these games.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Fantasy Crypto & Stocks ?
title: ফ্যান্টাসি ক্রিপ্টো এবং স্টক কি?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "এই গেমে আপনাকে ক্রিপ্টো কয়েন বা স্টকের ফ্যান্টাসি পোর্টফোলিও তৈরি করতে আপনার মার্কেট অ্যানালিসিস দক্ষতা ব্যবহার করতে হবে। সেরা পোর্টফোলিও জিতবে! \nনিয়মিত খেলার মাধ্যমে আপনার দক্ষতা বাড়ান এবং মার্কেট সম্পর্কে নিজেকে আপডেট রাখুন। এই খেলার মাধ্যমে আপনি আর্থিক বাজার সম্পর্কে আরও বেশি বুঝতে পারেন এবং একই সাথে মজা করতে পারেন!", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Fantasy Crypto & Stocks ?
title: ఫాంటసీ క్రిప్టో మరియు స్టాక్స్ అంటే ఏమిటి?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "ఈ గేమ్‌లో మీరు క్రిప్టో కాయిన్స్ లేదా స్టాక్‌ల ఫాంటసీ పోర్ట్‌ఫోలియోను రూపొందించడానికి మీ మార్కెట్ విశ్లేషణ నైపుణ్యాలను ఉపయోగించాలి. ఉత్తమ పోర్ట్‌ఫోలియో విజయాలు!\r\nక్రమం తప్పకుండా ఆడడం ద్వారా మరియు మార్కెట్ల గురించి మిమ్మల్ని మీరు అప్‌డేట్ చేసుకోవడం ద్వారా మీ నైపుణ్యాలను మెరుగుపరచుకోండి. ఈ గేమ్ ద్వారా మీరు ఆర్థిక మార్కెట్ల గురించి మరింత అర్థం చేసుకోవచ్చు మరియు అదే సమయంలో ఆనందించవచ్చు!", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Fantasy Crypto & Stocks ?
title: फ़ैंटेसी क्रिप्टो और स्टॉक क्या है?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "इस गेम में आपको क्रिप्टो कॉइन या स्टॉक्स का एक फ़ैंटेसी पोर्टफ़ोलियो बनाने के लिए अपने बाज़ार विश्लेषण कौशल का उपयोग करना होगा। सर्वश्रेष्ठ पोर्टफ़ोलियो जीतता है!\r\nनियमित रूप से खेलकर और बाज़ारों के बारे में खुद को अपडेट रखते हुए अपने कौशल में सुधार करें। इस खेल के माध्यम से आप एक ही समय पर वित्तीय बाज़ारों के बारे में अधिक जान सकते है और मज़ा भी कर सकते हैं!\r", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: My KYC was rejected, how do I proceed ?
title: माझे KYC नाकारले गेले, मी पुढे प्रक्रिया कशी करू?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": ""आपले KYC खालील कारणांमुळे नाकारले गेले असेेल:

 कागदपत्रावरील माहिती स्पष्टपणे दिसत नाही.

आम्हाला आपला ID केंद्रीय डेटाबेस (NDSL किंवा UIDAI) वर शोधता आला नाही. 

शासनिक डेटाबेसमधून मिळालेली माहिती आपण सादर केलेल्या दस्तऐवजातील डेटाशी मॅच होत नाही."", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Minute Poker-Can I draw and withdraw from the game?
title: Can I draw and withdraw from the game?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Yes. Every wager and every winning is a direct debit and credit action from the MPL wallet.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Fantasy Crypto & Stocks ?
title: ஃபேண்டஸி கிரிப்டோ & ஸ்டாக்ஸ் என்றால் என்ன?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "இந்த கேமில் கிரிப்டோ காயின்ஸ் அல்லது ஸ்டாக்ஸ் ஃபேண்டஸி போர்ட்ஃபோலியோவை உருவாக்க உங்கள் மார்க்கெட் அனலிசிஸ் திறன்களைப் பயன்படுத்த வேண்டும். சிறந்த போர்ட்ஃபோலியோ வெற்றி பெறும்!\nதொடர்ந்து விளையாடுவதன் மூலமும், மார்க்கெட்ஸ் பற்றிய அப்டேட்ஸ் தெரிந்துகொள்வதன் மூலமும் உங்கள் திறமைகளை மேம்படுத்திக் கொள்ளலாம். இந்த கேமின் மூலம் நீங்கள் ஃபைனான்ஸியல் மார்க்கெட்ஸ் பற்றி புரிந்துகொள்ளலாம், அதே நேரத்தில் இது வேடிக்கையாகவும் இருக்கும்!", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}
