The prize pool distribution occurs only in the final phase.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How to play Call Break?
title: How to play Call Break?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Each player needs to declare the number of tricks they expect to win before starting the round. While playing any round, each player must throw a card in the following order:
- Throw a higher rank lead suit card
- Throw any lead suit card
- Throw a trump suit card
- Throw any suit card

Each trick is won by the highest ranked card thrown in that round, and Spades is the default trump in all rounds.

To understand the game in detail, please click here.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How to leave a poker table?
title: How to leave a poker table?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "We request our players to follow the basic playing etiquettes of poker. When you wish to leave a table, please-

Tick mark the “sit-out” option.

Once it is acknowledged by our gaming software, you can Sit Out from the table.

Click the “leave table” button.

Note: In case the above steps are not properly followed, sometimes the table may continue and the balance might get deducted as Small Blind and Big Blind", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/12203522751b4102af38ba7d6e524cf2.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "Click on the Sit out checkbox", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/6737c48660ac4d649a64839be8450799.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "Click on Exit", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}]}

text: What are Multi-Flight Tourneys?
title: What are Multi-Flight Tourneys?

text: Why should you play Multi-Flight Tourneys?
title: Why should you play Multi-Flight Tourneys?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The best thing about multi-flight poker tournaments is that any time a player fails to qualify for the final tournament through a particular flight can take another shot by playing another flight. So, if you fail to qualify through Flight 1A, you can always play Flight 1B or Flight 1C to earn your ticket to the main event. \nTo summarize, players can choose to play any starting flight and qualify from one of these flights to the final tournament.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is the structure and steps of a Multi-Flight Tournament?
title: What is the structure and steps of a Multi-Flight Tournament?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Here’s a look at an example of an online poker multi-flight tournament to help illustrate the above-
MPL Showdown x GTD MULTI-FLIGHT TOURNAMENT STRUCTURE
Flight Tournaments:
MPL Showdown Flight 1A – 11.30 AM
MPL Showdown Flight 1B – 2.30 PM
MPL Showdown Flight 1C – 5.30 PM
Final Tournament:
x GTD – 9 PM (No Direct Entry)
 
STEPS to play the x GTD multi-flight tournament :
Play any of the Flight 1A / 1B / 1C
Survive till level 26 to qualify for the Final tournament
All remaining players from each flight will automatically qualify for the Main Event at 9PM with their remaining stack.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Deals rummy?
title: What is Deals rummy?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Deal Rummy is a variant of 13 card Indian Rummy where players pay a fixed entry fee which forms the prize pool. In this variant, players pay with score allocated at the start of each game. It is also played for a pre-decided number of deals or rounds. At the end of each round, winner takes all score lost by opponents. Winner is decided based on the person who has the most score at the completion of all deals.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How are points calculated?
title: How are points calculated?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Each card carries a certain number of points. The losing player gets points equal to his/her hand score which is computed as follows :

J, Q, K, A of any suit carry 10 points each.

All other numbered cards carry the same points as their face value e.g. 7 carries 7 points and 3 carries 3 points.

Joker cards carry zero points.

At the end of the game, a losing player's hand score is computed by adding points for cards that are not grouped as sets/sequences with the following exceptions. 

If the losing player has no pure sequence, all cards are counted.

If the losing player does not have two sequences, but has a pure sequence, only the pure sequence is not counted.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Call Break?
title: What is Call Break?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Call Break is a four player card game which is played with a deck of 52 cards. Cards are distributed equally and randomly among the players (13 cards each). Now, the players have to estimate & call their possible winnable tricks and they must call atleast 1 trick. Usually there are 4 rounds in a game. At the end of all rounds, score is calculated and winner is declared. Player having highest score is declared as the winner.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Do I need to have the same account for both BGMI and MPL in order to play?
title: Do I need to have the same account for both BGMI and MPL in order to play?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "No, you can have separate accounts for both MPL & BGMI and it will still work.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How are scores calculated in Call Break?
title: How are scores calculated in Call Break?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If you win all tricks equal to call made, you get 1 point. In case you win tricks more than the call made, you get points equivalent to call + 0.1 points for every extra trick.  If you win less tricks than the call made, you get negative score equal to call made. 
Example:
1) Player A calls 2 tricks, and wins 2 tricks, then 2 points are given.
2) Player B calls 2 tricks, and wins 5 tricks, then 2.3 points (2 points for call, and +0.1 points for every extra trick made) are given
3) Player C calls 2 tricks, and wins 1 trick, then -2 points are given", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How do I know which is a winning trick?
title: How do I know which is a winning trick?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "A trump suit or card of any value tops the card of any rank from any other suit. When no cards of same suit are available, Trump card can be used to conquer other cards. Spade is by default trump suit.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What are Battles?
title: What are Battles?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Battles are one time gameplay against opponents. You are supposed to pay once and if you win you will get the winning amount immediately in the wallet.\n\nThese battles can be one on one gameplays or multiplayer - multi-winner gameplays.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: For how long do the tournaments run?
title: For how long do the tournaments run?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Tournaments are available for durations as low as 20 minutes to as high as even a day or more. You can check the Tournament's Starting and Ending time in front of each tournament's name and also by clicking on the tournament name.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

The best score in the challenge wins the leaderboard!\nImprove your skills by playing regularly.  Through this game, you can have fun and earn money at the same time.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: If I don’t have BGMI installed, do I need to download it separately or can I download it through BGMI Challenge?

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Yes you will have to install the BGMI from the play store and then come back to the App to Play.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Antibanking?
title: What is Antibanking?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Antibanking is a feature which promotes fairplay in Poker by allowing losing players to win back money they might have lost in the previous Poker rounds/hands. It helps retain cash on the table by putting rules in place for players who tend to leave as soon as they grab a big hand thereby leaving the other players with no chance to win their money back. It's not applicable for Rapid/ Fast-Fold tables.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How does Antibanking work?
title: How does Antibanking work?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "STEPPER", "details": {"steps": ["Player joins a table with minimum Buy-In", "Wins money", "Leaves table by closing it (Goes to the lobby)"], "title": "Case 1"}}, {"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "1. The player can rejoin the table with an amount not less than what he left with.\n2. If the player won more than max Buy-In, he can rejoin the table only with the amount he left with.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}, {"type": "STEPPER", "details": {"steps": ["Player joins a table with minimum Buy-In", "Wins money", "Leaves table without closing"], "title": "Case 2"}}, {"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "1. The player can rejoin the table with an amount not less than what he left with.\n2. If the player won more than max Buy-In, he can rejoin the table only with the amount he left with.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Zero se Hero Festival?
title: What is Zero se Hero Festival?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Zero Se Hero festival is one of the most exciting events on the MPL app where players can play games for free and stand a chance to win real money. The festival will be held from July 7th to July 28th and players can play up to 50 games every day in categories like Rummy, Ludo, Call Break, and Poker. There’s absolutely no entry fee required but players can still win real cash prizes.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What kind of events can I join in this festival?
title: What events can I join in Zero se Hero festival?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "During the Zero Se Hero festival, the MPL app will feature Bonus Blast on Rummy, Zero Entry Lobbies, and Zero Entry Tournaments for specific games. Players can join any of these events as per preference.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: July IP - What are the taxes applicable if I win?
title: What are the taxes applicable if I win?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "According to the Income Tax Act of 1961, 31.2% of tax will be deducted if an individual’s net winnings for a single contest exceed Rs. 10,000. Your winnings balance will be credited with the remaining amount (68.8%).\nFor instance, if a player wins Rs. 1,000,000, tax of Rs. 31,200 will be deducted, and the actual winnings will amount to Rs. 68,800.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: July IP - When will I get my winnings?
title: When will I get my winnings?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Once the event or tournament ends, the results are verified and declared within 12 hours. The winning amount is then credited to the winner’s MPL Wallet. Please contact our customer support if you do not receive your winning amount within 12 hours.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: July IP - How can I withdraw my winnings?
title: How can I withdraw my winnings?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can withdraw your winnings easily from the MPL Wallet into real cash. Firstly, ensure that your MPL account is KYC verified (a one-time process). If your account is verified, you can withdraw your winnings instantly via Paytm, Amazon Pay, UPI, or Bank Transfer.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Why am I unable to play free battles?
title: Why am I unable to play free battles?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "After playing few free battles in Zero Se Hero Festival, the lobbies are locked up.\nBut worry not, you can start playing free battles again after the timer has elapsed.\nMeanwhile, you can play your favourite game on the paid lobbies. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How to join the Zero Se Hero events?
title: How to join Zero Se Hero events?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The ZSH event will be active on the MPL Pro app from July 7th to July 28th. Players can join this event by downloading the MPL Pro app and playing the games included in the event. Just pick your preferred game and start competing with real players. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What happens if I have no valid moves?
title: What happens if I have no valid moves?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If there are no playable cards, you can draw a new card from the stockpile or use a wild card to place any card on top of it.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "POINTS", "details": {"type": "BULLET", "title": "Once you have requested for MPL account deletion:", "points": ["We erase all your game-related history which means your details such as username, game plays so far can never be recovered", "Your identity verification information (if applicable) will be deleted", "Your followers, seasons pass, or tickets (if any) will be deleted"], "titlePreset": "b1", "pointsPreset": "b1", "titleTextColor": "black", "pointsTextColor": "black"}}]}

text: What is multi-table in MPL Rummy?

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Multi-table helps you to play rummy game(s) on more than one table at the same time.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How to add a new table while playing on my existing table?
title: How to add a new table while playing on my existing table?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can add a new table from the +Add Table button present on the left side of your game table. This will open a list of eligible rummy formats and table from which you can select and start playing along with your current table. (Only available in select tables at the moment)", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How many tables can I play at the same time?

Please note that the maximum number of tables which you can open at same time might be reduced based on your device’s compatibility and performance.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

We would enable multi-table options across other rummy formats of deals, points and tournaments very soon.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How will I know if I have reached my max table limit?

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The add table button will be disabled and show the maximum table limit reached.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can choose the option of Go to lobby from the menu options, which will take you to MPL Rummy homepage from where you can add wallet balance. Then you can use the rejoin button present on the lobby page to join the table.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}, {"type": "ALERT_BANNER", "details": {"type": "DEFAULT", "title": "Please Note", "iconName": "!", "subTitle": "It takes some time to go to MPL home to add money and rejoin the game, which might make you lose your turn or game.", "iconIsMaterial": false}}]}

text: How can I rejoin my game if I face network issues or app crashes?

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "In case of network issue or app crash you can rejoin all your active tables from the rejoin option present above the lobbies. The rejoin option will be visible if you have any active game ongoing.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Can I take part in more than 1 flight tourney?

text: How to go back to the lobby page?
title: How to go back to the lobby page?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "In the menu drawer present on the top left side of your table, there is a Go to Lobby button. On clicking this option you would be taken to the rummy home page. You won’t be exited from any of your active games , and games will keep running in the background. You can join them back from the rejoin option present on the rummy home page.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How can I join a new game from the lobby page in multi-table?

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "POINTS", "details": {"type": "NUMBER", "title": "If you have any active game running which supports multi-table and you have come back to the rummy home page, upon clicking any new lobby to join following will happen:", "points": ["If the new lobby which you wish to join has multi-table support and you haven’t reached your maximum table limit, then the new game would open in multi-table along with your other active tables", "If the new lobby which you wish to join doesn’t support multi-table, then you would be asked whether you wish to close all your current active tables and join a new table, or would you like to go back to your current active tables without joining the new table", ""], "titlePreset": "b1", "pointsPreset": "b1", "titleTextColor": "black", "pointsTextColor": "black"}}]}

After clicking on the selected contest, click on the 'Edit' option showing against your entry and update it.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Me and my Opponent(s) have the exact scores, how will the prize distribution happen?
title: Me and my Opponent(s) have the exact scores, how will the prize distribution happen?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "In the rare event that multiple participants tie for a rank in the prize list, that prize, as well as the next n-1 prizes will be split evenly among the tied participants, where n is the number of participants that tied for that rank.
Example -
If 2 people tie for 4th place, the 4th and 5th place prizes will be added together, and then split evenly by the tied participants.

In the event that there are fewer than n prizes available, then the remaining prizes will be split evenly among the remaining winners.
Example – In a Pool of 10 winners
1. If 2 people tie for 10th place, they will split the 10th place prize evenly.
2. If 3 people tie for 9th place, they will split the 9th and 10th place prize evenly.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If the withdrawal is marked success, we credit the same to your account. Due to technical errors at your bank end/Paytm/Amazon pay, there might be a delay with reflecting the amount. Please wait for 3-4 business days for the same, or raise the issue to the source, with the details of the transaction that have been shown to you in the previous screen. \n", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

If your transaction is in pending even after the timer has elapsed, please check if your KYC at the Paytm is pending, it will credited back to your MPL wallet if you don't complete your KYCs. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Why is my UPI / Bank Withdrawal is pending?

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Please wait for the timer to end, your withdrawal will be successfully credited to your account till the timer elapses.\nIn some cases, it may take upto 3 business days for a UPI transaction and 7 business days for bank transfer to be reflected in your account. Do not worry, if the transaction fails at any point the money will be deposited back to your MPL wallet. This can happen due to issues in the banking infrastructure.\n", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How to leave a poker table?
title: কিভাবে একটি পোকার টেবিল ছাড়তে হয়?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "আমরা আমাদের খেলোয়াড়দের পোকার খেলার প্রাথমিক শিষ্টাচার অনুসরণ করার জন্য অনুরোধ করি। আপনি যখন একটি টেবিল ছেড়ে যেতে চান, অনুগ্রহ করে - \"সিট-আউট\" বিকল্পে টিক চিহ্ন দিন। \n একবার এটি আমাদের গেমিং সফ্টওয়্যার দ্বারা স্বীকার করা হলে, আপনি টেবিল থেকে সিট্-আউট করতে পারেন। \n \"টেবিল ছেড়ে দিন\" বাটনে ক্লিক করুন।                 দ্রষ্টব্য: উপরের স্টেপগুলি সঠিকভাবে অনুসরণ না করা হলে, কখনও কখনও টেবিল কন্টিনিউ হতে পারে এবং স্মল ব্লাইন্ড এবং বিগ ব্লাইন্ড হিসাবে ব্যালেন্স কাটা হতে পারে। ", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/12203522751b4102af38ba7d6e524cf2.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "সিট আউট চেকবক্সে ক্লিক করুন", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/6737c48660ac4d649a64839be8450799.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "এক্জিট' ক্লিক করুন", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}]}

text: How to leave a poker table?
title: పోకర్ టేబుల్ ను ఎలా వదిలివేయాలి?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "పోకర్ యొక్క ప్రాథమిక ఆట నియమాలు అనుసరించమని మేము మా ప్లేయర్స్‌ని అభ్యర్థిస్తున్నాము. మీరు టేబుల్‌ని వదిలి వెళ్లాలనుకున్నప్పుడు, దయచేసి- 

"సిట్-అవుట్" ఎంపికను టిక్ మార్క్ చేయండి.

ఇది మా గేమింగ్ సాఫ్ట్‌వేర్ ద్వారా అంగీకరించబడిన తర్వాత, మీరు టేబుల్ నుండి సిట్ అవుట్ చేయవచ్చు.
 
"టేబుల్‌ని వదిలి వెళ్ళండి" బటన్ క్లిక్ చేయండి.

గమనిక: పై దశలను సరిగ్గా అనుసరించకపోతే, కొన్నిసార్లు టేబుల్ కొనసాగవచ్చు మరియు బ్యాలెన్స్ చిన్న బ్లైండ్ మరియు పెద్ద బ్లైండ్‌గా తీసివేయబడవచ్చు", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/12203522751b4102af38ba7d6e524cf2.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "సిట్ అవుట్ చెక్‌బాక్స్‌పై క్లిక్ చేయండి", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/6737c48660ac4d649a64839be8450799.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "నిష్క్రమించడంపై క్లిక్ చేయండి", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}]}

text: How to leave a poker table?
title: Poker table kaise chhoden?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Ham apne players se poker ke basic khel shishtachaar ka palan karne ki request karte hain. Jab aap table chhodna chaahein, tab kripya - 

"Bahar baithein" ke vikalp par tick karein. 

Hamare gaming software dwara ise sweekaar kar lene ke baad, aap table se bahar baith sakte hain. 

"Table chhodein" button par click karein. 

Dhyaan dein: Agar upar diye gaye steps ka thiks e palan nahin kiya jaata hai, to table jaari rah sakti hai aur aapka balance Small Blind aur Big Blind ke roop mein kat sakta hai", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/12203522751b4102af38ba7d6e524cf2.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "Cit out checkbox per click karen", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/6737c48660ac4d649a64839be8450799.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "Exit per click karen", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}]}

text: How to leave a poker table?
title: પોકર ટેબલ કેવી રીતે છોડવું?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "અમે અમારા પ્લેયરને પોકર રમવાના મૂળભૂત શિષ્ટાચારને અનુસરવાની વિનંતી કરીએ છીએ. જ્યારે તમે ટેબલ છોડવા માંગો છો, કૃપા કરીને-

"સીટ-આઉટ" વિકલ્પ પર ટિક માર્ક કરો. 

એકવાર તે અમારા ગેમિંગ સોફ્ટવેર દ્વારા સ્વીકારવામાં આવે, પછી તમે ટેબલમાંથી સીટ આઉટ થઈ શકો છો. 

"ટેબલ છોડો" બટન પર ક્લિક કરો. 

નોંધ: જો ઉપરોક્ત સ્ટેપ યોગ્ય રીતે અનુસરવામાં ન આવે તો, કેટલીકવાર ટેબલ ચાલુ રહે છે અને બેલેન્સ સ્મોલ બ્લાઈન્ડ અને બિગ બ્લાઈન્ડ તરીકે કાપવામાં આવી શકે છે", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/12203522751b4102af38ba7d6e524cf2.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "સીટ આઉટ ચેકબોક્સ પર ક્લિક કરો", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/6737c48660ac4d649a64839be8450799.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "બહાર નીકળો પર ક્લિક કરો", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}]}

title: ஒரு போக்கர் டேபிளில் இருந்து எவ்வாறு வெளியேறுவது?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "போக்கரின் அடிப்படை நெறிமுறைகளைப் பின்பற்றுமாறு எங்கள் பிளேயர்களிடம் கேட்டுக்கொள்கிறோம். டேபிளில் இருந்து நீங்கள் வெளியேறும்போது, தயவுசெய்து “சிட்-அவுட்” விருப்பத்தை டிக் செய்யவும். எங்களது கேமிங் மென்பொருள் மூலம் அது ஒப்புக்கொள்ளப்பட்டதும், டேபிளில் இருந்து நீங்கள் சிட் அவுட் ஆகலாம். “டேபிளை விட்டு வெளியேறவும்” என்ற பட்டனைக் கிளிக் செய்யவும். குறிப்பு: மேலே உள்ள படிகள் முறையாகப் பின்பற்றப்படவில்லை எனில், சில நேரங்களில் டேபிள் தொடர்ந்து இருக்கும். மேலும் பேலன்ஸானது ஸ்மால் பிளைண்ட் மற்றும் பிக் பிளைண்டாக கழிக்கப்படக்கூடும்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/12203522751b4102af38ba7d6e524cf2.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "சிட் அவுட் செக்பாக்ஸ் மீது கிளிக் செய்க", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/6737c48660ac4d649a64839be8450799.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "வெளியேறு என்பதைக் கிளிக் செய்க", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}]}

content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "आम्ही आमच्या प्लेअर्सना पोकर खेळण्याच्या मूलभूत शिष्टाचारांचे पालन करण्याची विनंती करतो. आपल्याला टेबल सोडायचे असल्यास, कृपया पुढील गोष्ट करा-

”सिट-आउट” पर्यायावर खूण करा.

एकदा आमच्या गेमिंग सॉफ्टवेअरने हे मान्य केले की, आपण टेबलमधून बाहेर बसू शकता.

”टेबल सोडा“ बटणावर क्लिक करा.

टीप: वरील पायऱ्यांचे योग्य प्रकारे पालन न केल्यास, काहीवेळा टेबस चालू राहू शकतो आणि बॅलन्स स्मॉल ब्लाइंड आणि बिग ब्लाइंड म्हणून वजा केले जाऊ शकते.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/12203522751b4102af38ba7d6e524cf2.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "सीट आऊट चेकबॉक्सवर क्लिक करा", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/6737c48660ac4d649a64839be8450799.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "बाहेर पडा वर क्लिक करा", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}]}

text: What are Multi-Flight Tourneys?
title: মাল্টি-ফ্লাইট টার্নিজ কী?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "মাল্টি ফ্লাইট পোকার টার্নিজ হল এমন টুর্নামেন্ট যেখানে খেলোয়াড়দের মূল টুর্নামেন্টের যোগ্যতা অর্জনের জন্য ফ্লাইট টুর্নামেন্টগুলি খেলতে হবে। প্রতিটি স্টার্টিং ফ্লাইট টুর্নামেন্ট একই ব্লাইন্ড লেভেল পর্যন্ত খেলা হয় এবং সমস্ত ফ্লাইট থেকে বেঁচে থাকা খেলোয়াড়রা ফাইনাল মূল টুর্নামেন্টের জন্য যোগ্যতা অর্জন করে। ফাইনাল টুর্নামেন্টে বাকি সমস্ত খেলোয়াড় রয়েছে যারা ফ্লাইট টুর্নামেন্ট থেকে বাদ যায়নি।\nফাইনাল টুর্নামেন্টে একটি প্রাইজ পুল রয়েছে যা সমস্ত ফ্লাইট টুর্নামেন্ট থেকে সংগ্রহ করা হয় এবং চূড়ান্ত পর্যায়ে একত্রিত হয় , প্রাইজ পুল বিতরণ কেবল টুর্নামেন্টের চূড়ান্ত পর্যায়ে করা হয়। খেলোয়াড়রা সরাসরি ফাইনাল টুর্নামেন্টে রেজিস্টার করতে পারে না এবং কেবল যে কোনও ফ্লাইট টুর্নামেন্ট খেলে যোগ্যতা অর্জন করতে পারে। একটি সিঙ্গল চিপ দিয়ে ফ্লাইট টুর্নামেন্ট শেষ হলেও খেলোয়াড়রা ফাইনাল টুর্নামেন্টের জন্য যোগ্যতা অর্জন করবে।                উদাহরণস্বরূপ, একটি টুর্নামেন্টে তিনটি স্টার্টিং ফ্লাইট রয়েছে : A, B এবং C. ফ্লাইট A, B এবং C খেলা হয় এবং প্রতিটি ফ্লাইট টুর্নামেন্ট একটি নির্দিষ্ট লেভেলে ( ধরুন লেভেল 26 ) বন্ধ হবে। প্রতিটি ফ্লাইটের বাকি খেলোয়াড়দের 26তম লেভেল থেকে রাত্রি 9টায় তাদের অবশিষ্ট স্ট্যাক (একাধিক স্ট্যাক থেকে সবচেয়ে বড় স্ট্যাক, যদি কোনো কিছু থাকে) দিয়ে ফাইনাল টুর্নামেন্ট শুরু করবে।", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What are Multi-Flight Tourneys?
title: મલ્ટી-ફ્લાઈટ ટુર્ની શું છે?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "મલ્ટી ફ્લાઈટ પોકર ટુર્ની એ ટુર્નામેન્ટ છે જ્યાં પ્લેયર એ મુખ્ય ટુર્નામેન્ટ માટે પાત્ર થવા માટે ફ્લાઈટ ટુર્નામેન્ટ રમવાની જરૂર હોય છે. દરેક પ્રારંભિક ફ્લાઈટ ટુર્નામેન્ટ સમાન બ્લાઈન્ડ લેવલ સુધી રમવામાં આવે છે અને તમામ ફ્લાઈટમાંથી બચેલા પ્લેયર ફાઈનલ મુખ્ય ટુર્નામેન્ટ માટે પાત્ર થાય છે. ફાઈનલ ટુર્નામેન્ટમાં એક પ્રાઈઝ પૂલ હોય છે જે તમામ ફ્લાઈટ ટુર્નામેન્ટ દ્વારા એકત્રિત કરવામાં આવે છે અને ફાઈનલ ફેઝમાં એકત્રિત કરવામાં આવે છે, પ્રાઈઝ પૂલનું વિતરણ ટુર્નામેન્ટના ફાઈનલ ફેઝમાં જ કરવામાં આવે છે. પ્લેયર ફાઈનલ ટુર્નામેન્ટમાં સીધી નોંધણી કરાવી શકતા નથી અને કોઈપણ ફ્લાઈટ ટુર્નામેન્ટ રમીને જ પાત્ર થઈ શકે છે. પ્લેયર ફાઈનલ ટુર્નામેન્ટ માટે પાત્ર થશે, ભલે તેઓ એક સિંગલ ચિપ સાથે ફ્લાઈટ ટુર્નામેન્ટ પૂરી કરે. \n\nઉદાહરણ તરીકે, ટુર્નામેન્ટમાં ત્રણ પ્રારંભિક ફ્લાઈટ છે: A, B અને C. ફ્લાઈટ A, B અને C રમવામાં આવે છે અને દરેક ફ્લાઈટ ટુર્નામેન્ટ ચોક્કસ લેવલ પર બંધ થશે (ધારો કે લેવલ 26). લેવલ 26 પછી દરેક ફ્લાઈટમાંથી બાકીના તમામ પ્લેયર તેમના બાકીના સ્ટેક સાથે ફાઈનલ ટુર્નામેન્ટ શરૂ કરવા માટે 9 PM મળશે (જો કોઈ હોય તો બહુવિધ સ્ટેક્સમાંથી સૌથી મોટો સ્ટેક).", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What are Multi-Flight Tourneys?
title: மல்ட்டி ஃபிளைட் டோர்னீஸ் என்றால் என்ன?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "மல்ட்டி ஃபிளைட் போக்கர் டோர்னீஸ் என்பது டோர்னமென்ட்டுகளாகும். முதன்மை டோர்னமென்ட்டிற்குத் தகுதிபெற, பிளேயர்கள் இந்த ஃபிளைட் டோர்னமென்ட்டுகளை விளையாட வேண்டும். ஒவ்வொரு தொடக்க ஃபிளைட் டோர்னமென்ட்டிலும் அதே லெவல் வரை விளையாட வேண்டும். மேலும் அனைத்து ஃபிளைட்டுகளிலும் சர்வைவ் ஆகியிருக்கும் பிளேயர்கள் இறுதி முதன்மை டோர்னமென்ட்டிற்குத் தகுதிபெறுவார்கள். ஃபிளைட் டோர்னமென்ட்டுகளில் வெளியேற்றப்படாத அனைத்துப் பிளேயர்களும் இறுதி டோர்னமென்ட்டில் பங்கேற்பார்கள். இறுதி டோர்னமென்ட்டானது, ஒரு பிரைஸ் பூலைக் கொண்டிருக்கும். இது அனைத்து ஃபிளைட் டோர்னமென்ட்டுகளிலும் சேகரிக்கப்பட்டு இறுதி சுற்றிற்காக ஒருங்கிணைக்கப்படும். டோர்னமென்ட்டின் இறுதிப் பகுதியில் மட்டுமே பிரைஸ் பூல் பகிர்ந்தளிக்கப்படும். பிளேயர்கள் நேரடியாக இறுதி டோர்னமென்ட்டிற்குப் பதிவுசெய்ய முடியாது, அத்துடன் ஏதேனும் ஒரு ஃபிளைட் டோர்னமென்ட்டை விளையாடுவதன் மூலமாக மட்டுமே அதற்குத் தகுதிபெற முடியும். ஒரே ஒரே ஒரு சிப்பின் மூலமாக ஃபிளைட் டோர்னமென்ட்டை நிறைவுசெய்தாலும் பிளேயர்கள் இறுதி டோர்னமென்ட்டிற்குத் தகுதிபெறுவார்கள். உதாரணமாக, ஒரு டோர்னமென்ட்டில் மூன்று தொடக்க ஃபிளைட்டுகள் இருக்கும்: A, B மற்றும் C. A, B, C ஆகிய ஃபிளைட்டுகள் மூலம் விளையாடலாம். ஒவ்வொரு ஃபிளைட் டோர்னமெண்ட்டும் குறிப்பிட்ட லெவலில் (26 லெவல் எனக் கூறலாம்) நிறுத்தப்படும். ஒவ்வொரு ஃபிளைட்டிலும் எஞ்சியுள்ள அனைத்துப் பிளேயர்களும், 26வது லெவலுக்குப் பிறகு, அவர்களிடம் எஞ்சியுள்ள ஸ்டேக்குடன் (பல ஸ்டேக்குகள் இருந்தால் அவற்றில் அதிகபட்ச ஸ்டேக்குடன்) இறுதி டோர்னமென்ட்டைத் தொடங்குவதற்காக 9 PMக்குச் சந்திப்பார்கள்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "மேலே இருப்பதை விவரிக்க உதவக்கூடிய, ஆன்லைன் போக்கர் மல்ட்டி ஃபிளைட் டோர்னமென்ட்டின் உதாரணத்தை இங்கே பார்க்கவும் -
MPL ஷோடவுன் x GTD மல்ட்டி ஃபிளைட் டோர்னமென்ட் ஸ்ட்ரக்ச்சர் ஃபிளைட் டோர்னமென்டுகள்:
MPL ஷோடவுன் ஃபிளைட் 1A – 11.30 AM
MPL ஷோடவுன் ஃபிளைட் 1B – 2.30 PM
MPL ஷோடவுன் ஃபிளைட் 1C – 5.30 PM இறுதி டோர்னமென்ட்:
x GTD – 9 PM (நேரடி எண்ட்ரி கிடையாது) x GTD மல்ட்டி ஃபிளைட் டோர்னமெண்ட்டை விளையாடுவதற்கான படிகள் : இறுதி டோர்னமென்ட்டிற்குத் தகுதிபெற, ஏதேனும் ஒரு ஃபிளைட் 1A / 1B / 1C சர்வைவ் கேமில் 26வது லெவல் வரை செல்லவும். ஒவ்வொரு ஃபிளைட்டிலும் கடைசியாக இருக்கும் அனைத்துப் பிளேயர்களும் அவர்களுடைய மீதமிருக்கும் ஸ்டேக்குடன் 9PM மணியளவில் நடக்கவிருக்கும் முதன்மை நிகழ்விற்குத் தானாகவே தகுதிபெறுவார்கள்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

title: কেন আপনার মাল্টি-ফ্লাইট টার্নিজ খেলা উচিত ?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "মাল্টি-ফ্লাইট পোকার টুর্নামেন্টের অন্যতম বিষয়টি হ'ল কোনও খেলোয়াড় কোনও নির্দিষ্ট ফ্লাইটের মাধ্যমে ফাইনাল টুর্নামেন্টের জন্য যোগ্যতা অর্জন করতে ব্যর্থ হলে অন্য ফ্লাইটের মাধ্যমে অন্য শট নিতে পারে। সুতরাং, যদি আপনি ফ্লাইট 1A এর মাধ্যমে যোগ্যতা অর্জন করতে ব্যর্থ হন, তবে আপনি মূল ইভেন্টে আপনার টিকিট অর্জনের জন্য সর্বদা ফ্লাইট 1B বা ফ্লাইট 1C খেলতে পারেন।\nসংক্ষেপে বলতে গেলে , খেলোয়াড়রা যেকোনও স্টার্টিং ফ্লাইট বেছে নিতে পারে এবং এই ফ্লাইটের যেকোনো একটি থেকে ফাইনাল টুর্নামেন্টে যাওয়ার যোগ্যতা অর্জন করতে পারে।", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Multi-flight poker tournament ke baar emein sabse achchi baat yah hai ki jab bhi koi khiladi kisi vishesh flight ke madhyam se final tournament ke liye qualify nahin kar paata, to vah kisi aur flight se khelne ka doosra mauka paa sakta hai. To yadi aap Flight 1A se qualify nahin kar paate, to mukhya event ka ticket jeetne ke liye Flight 1B yaa Flight 1C khel sakte hain. \nSankshep mein, khilaadi koi bhi shuruaati flight khelne ka vikalp chun sakte hain aur in flights meins ekisi bhi ek flight ko khelkar antim tournament khelne ke liye qualify kar sakte hain.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

title: તમારે મલ્ટી-ફ્લાઈટ ટુર્ની કેમ રમવી જોઈએ?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "મલ્ટી-ફ્લાઈટ પોકર ટુર્નામેન્ટની સૌથી સારી બાબત એ છે કે જ્યારે પણ કોઈ પ્લેયર ચોક્કસ ફ્લાઈટ દ્વારા ફાઈનલ ટુર્નામેન્ટ માટે પાત્ર થવામાં નિષ્ફળ જાય છે ત્યારે તે બીજી ફ્લાઈટ રમીને બીજો શોટ લઈ શકે છે. તેથી, જો તમે ફ્લાઈટ 1a દ્વારા પાત્ર થશો નહીં, તો તમે મુખ્ય ઈવેન્ટમાં તમારી ટિકિટ મેળવવા માટે હંમેશા ફ્લાઈટ 1b અથવા ફ્લાઈટ 1c રમી શકો છો.\nસારાંશ માટે, પ્લેયર કોઈપણ પ્રારંભિક ફ્લાઈટ રમવાનું પસંદ કરી શકે છે અને આ ફ્લાઈટમાંથી ફાઈનલ ટુર્નામેન્ટ માટે પાત્ર થઈ શકે છે.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Why should you play Multi-Flight Tourneys?
title: மல்ட்டி ஃபிளைட் டோர்னீஸை ஏன் நீங்கள் விளையாட வேண்டும்?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "மல்ட்டி ஃபிளைட் போக்கர் டோர்னமென்ட்டுகளில் உள்ள சிறந்த விஷயம் என்னவென்றால், இறுதி டோர்னமென்ட்டிற்குத் தகுதிபெற முடியாமல் ஒரு பிளேயர் தோல்வியடைந்து விட்டால் எந்த நேரத்திலும் அவர் மற்றொரு ஃபிளைட்டில் விளையாடி மற்றொரு வாய்ப்பைப் பெறலாம். அதாவது, ஃபிளைட் 1A மூலம் விளையாடி தோல்வியடைந்தால், மெயின் ஈவன்ட்டுக்கு டிக்கெட்டைச் சம்பாதிக்க நீங்கள் எப்போது வேண்டுமானாலும் ஃபிளைட் 1B அல்லது ஃபிளைட் 1C மூலம் விளையாடலாம். சுருக்கமாகக் கூறினால், பிளேயர்கள் எந்தவொரு ஸ்டார்டிங் ஃபிளைட்டையும் தேர்வுசெய்து இறுதி டோர்னமென்ட்டிற்குச் செல்ல இவற்றில் ஏதேனும் ஒரு ஃபிளைட்டின் மூலமாகத் தகுதிபெறலாம்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

title: आपको मल्टी-फ़्लाइट टूर्नी क्यों खेलनी चाहिए?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "मल्टी-फ़्लाइट पोकर टूर्नामेंट के बारे में सबसे अच्छी बात यह है कि जब भी कोई खिलाड़ी किसी विशेष फ़्लाइट के माध्यम से फ़ाइनल टूर्नामेंट के लिए क्वालिफ़ाई नहीं कर पाता, तो वह किसी और फ़्लाइट से खेलने का दूसरा मौका पा सकता है। तो यदि आप फ़्लाइट 1A से क्वालिफ़ाई नहीं कर पाते, तो मुख्य इवेंट का टिकट जीतने के लिए फ़्लाइट 1B या फ़्लाइट 1C खेल सकते हैं।\nसंक्षेप में, खिलाड़ी कोई भी शुरुआती फ़्लाइट खेलने का विकल्प चुन सकते हैं और इन फ़्लाइट्स में से किसी भी एक फ़्लाइट को खेलकर अंतिम टूर्नामेंट खेलने के लिए क्वालिफ़ाई कर सकते हैं।", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

title: आपण मल्टी-फ्लाइट टूर्नी का खेळल्या पाहिजेत?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "मल्टी-फ्लाइट पोकर टूर्नामेंट्सची सर्वात चांगली गोष्ट म्हणजे जेव्हा एखादा प्लेअर एखाद्या विशिष्ट फ्लाइटद्वारे अंतिम टूर्नामेंटसाठी पात्र ठरत नाही तेव्हा तो दुसरी फ्लाइट खेळून दुसरी संधी मिळवू शकतो. म्हणून, आपण फ्लाइट 1A द्वारे पात्र न ठरल्यास, आपण मुख्य इव्हेंटचे तिकीट मिळवण्यासाठी फ्लाइट 1B किंवा फ्लाइट 1C केव्हाही खेळू शकता.\nसारांश म्हणून, प्लेअर्स कोणतीही प्रारंभिक फ्लाइट खेळणे निवडू शकतात आणि यापैकी एका फ्लाइटमधून अंतिम टूर्नामेंटसाठी पात्र ठरू शकतात.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "અમે સમજી શકીએ છીએ કે તમે Team Clash તરફ આતુર હતા. જો કે, અનિવાર્ય સંજોગોને કારણે, અમે Team Clash બંધ કરવા માટે નિર્ણય લીધો છે. અમે જોયું છે કે તમને ખરેખર ગેમનું ફોર્મેટ ગમે છે અને અમે તમને ક્યારેય નિરાશ કરવા માંગતા નથી. અમારી પાસે તેને બંધ કરવા માટે કેટલાક અણધાર્યા કારણો છે. વધુ સારા અનુભવ માટે અમે તમારા માટે કેટલીક રસપ્રદ વિભાવનાઓ શરુ કરવાનું વિચારી રહ્યા છીએ. લેટેસ્ટ નોટિફિકેશન માટે અમારી એપ પર રહો.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Why is Team Clash getting closed?
title: Team Clash ஏன் மூடப்படுகிறது?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "நீங்கள் Team Clash இல் ஆர்வமாக இருந்தீர்கள் என்பதை எங்களால் புரிந்து கொள்ள முடிகிறது. இருப்பினும் தவிர்க்க முடியாத காரணங்களால் Team Clash-ஐ நிறுத்த இந்த காலை செய்துள்ளோம். நீங்கள் கேமின் வடிவமைப்பை மிகவும் விரும்புவதை நாங்கள் காண்கிறோம், நாங்கள் உங்களை ஒருபோதும் மனமுடையச் செய்ய விரும்ப மாட்டோம். அதை நிறுத்த சில எதிர்பாராத காரணங்கள் உள்ளன. சிறந்த அனுபவத்திற்காக உங்களுக்காக சில சுவாரஸ்யமான கருத்துக்களைப் பெற நாங்கள் திட்டமிட்டுள்ளோம். சமீபத்திய அறிவிப்புகளுக்கு எங்கள் அப்புடன் இணைந்திருங்கள்.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "சில நேரங்களில், தொழில்நுட்ப சிக்கல்கள் காரணமாக, கேம்கள் துரதிர்ஷ்டவசமாக ரத்து செய்யப்படுகின்றன. ஆனால் கவலைப்பட வேண்டாம், உங்கள் என்ட்ரி ஃபீ உடனடியாக உங்களுக்கு ரீஃபண்டு செய்யப்படுகிறது. உங்கள் ரீஃபண்டு செய்யப்பட்ட என்ட்ரி ஃபீயை பார்க்க தயவு செய்து உங்கள் வாலட்டை செக் செய்யவும். ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I won against my opponent, why is my game cancelled?

text: Why should you play Multi-Flight Tourneys?
title: మీరు మల్టీ-ఫ్లైట్ టోర్నీలు ఎందుకు ఆడాలి?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "మల్టీ-ఫ్లైట్ పోకర్ టోర్నమెంట్‌ల గురించిన గొప్ప విషయం ఏమిటంటే, ఏ సమయంలోనైనా ఒక నిర్దిష్ట ఫ్లైట్ ద్వారా ఫైనల్ టోర్నమెంట్‌కు అర్హత సాధించడంలో విఫలమైన ప్లేయర్ మరొక ఫ్లైట్ ఆడడం ద్వారా మరో షాట్ తీసుకోవచ్చు. కాబట్టి, మీరు ఫ్లైట్ 1A ద్వారా అర్హత సాధించడంలో విఫలమైతే, మీరు ప్రధాన ఈవెంట్‌కి మీ టిక్కెట్‌ సంపాదించడానికి ఫ్లైట్ 1B లేదా ఫ్లైట్ 1Cని ఆడవచ్చు. \nసంగ్రహంగా చెప్పాలంటే, ప్లేయర్స్ ఏదైనా ప్రారంభ ఫ్లైట్ ఆడటానికి ఎంచుకోవచ్చు మరియు ఈ ఫ్లైట్స్‌లో ఒకదాని నుండి చివరి టోర్నమెంట్‌కు అర్హత పొందవచ్చు.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is gems?

text: Why is Team Clash getting closed?
title: Team Clashని ఎందుకు మూసివేస్తున్నారు?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "మీరు Team Clash పట్ల ఆసక్తిగా ఉన్నారని మేము అర్థం చేసుకున్నాము. అయితే, అనివార్య పరిస్థితుల కారణంగా, మేము Team Clashను నిలిపివేయడానికి ఈ చర్య తీసుకున్నాము. మీరు గేమ్ ఫార్మాట్ నిజంగా ఇష్టపడుతున్నారని, మేము మిమ్మల్ని నిరుత్సాహపరచకూడదని అనుకున్నాము. దాన్ని ఆపడానికి మాకు కొన్ని ఊహించని కారణాలు ఉన్నాయి. మెరుగైన అనుభవం కోసం మీకు ఆసక్తికరమైన కాన్సెప్ట్‌లను రూపొందించడానికి మేము ప్లాన్ చేస్తున్నాము. కొత్త నోటిఫికేషన్‌ల కోసం మా యాప్‌ చూస్తూ ఉండండి.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How are the returns calculated on polls?
title: How are the returns calculated on polls?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/28d7caffc4d8437d9d91dace875c30ac.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "Returns are calculated on the basis of the number of users investing in the poll question options. Returns are dynamic and are calculated at the actual time of poll question settlement.", "titleTwo": "Here's an example:", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b1", "titleTwoPreset": "s2", "backgroundColor": "tint.green"}}]}

text: How did my potential returns change to a lower amount on settlement while I was shown a higher return during confirmation?
title: How did my potential returns change to a lower amount on settlement while I was shown a higher return during confirmation?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "While investing in a poll, potential returns based on the % of amount invested in each option is shown to the user. Note that the final returns in a poll question depends on the final investments made by all in the different options thereby impacting the % invested in each option.\n\nFor e.g., it might happen that during the poll confirmation, the winning option has only 20% of total investment but during settlement time, the winning option has 50% investment. This will reduce your potential winnings from Rs 50 to Rs 20 (with an investment of Rs 10 in the correct option). ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Rummy?
title: What is Rummy?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Rummy is a card game that is played with two decks of cards with a total of two Jokers. To win the rummy game a player must make a valid declaration by picking and discarding cards from the two piles given. The objective of the rummy card game is to arrange the 13 cards in valid sets and sequences", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is exit option on trades?
title: What is exit option on trades?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "As the price of “Yes” or “No” keeps fluctuating, you can exit and book your profits even before the results are out. Trade exit show pending when you did not get the exit matched with another user.\n\nExit option is available for all matched trades.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/5e4ccc9953f7455a8170716b21cdb881.jpeg", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": " ", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "b1", "titleTwoPreset": "b1", "backgroundColor": "tint.yellow"}}]}

text: I put an investment of Rs 4 - Yes in a trading question. How did I get matched with another user at Rs 6.5 - No? My investment was changed to Rs 3.5 - Yes.
title: I put an investment of Rs 4 (YES option) in a question. How did I get matched with another user at Rs 6.5 (NO option)? My investment was changed to Rs 3.5 (YES option).
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "When the user selects Rs 4 - Yes, we try to find a match at Rs 6 - No. In case a better match is found for the user (Rs 6.5 - No or more), we will do a match with that user at No and refund the difference. (In case a match is found with Rs 6.5 - No, we will match the user at Rs 3.5 - Yes and refund Rs 0.5 to them). We always match you at the best price available for you (minimum price).", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How are polls different from trades?
title: How are polls different from trades?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Generally polls have multiple options but when it comes to trades you can choose between Yes/No.\nAlso the winnings of a single trade event is fixed ( Rs 10 - … ), whereas winnings of a poll fluctuates with user responses.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is MPL Fantasy?

You can pick your own team by picking real players within a maximum budget of 100 credits. Your team earns points based on your chosen players’ performance in real-life matches and the higher your points, the better your winnings!", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How is matching done for the trade format?
title: How is matching done for any order?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Once you select your option and investment amount, we will find a match for you for the opposite opinion to complete the trade. E.g., If for a trading question, you selected YES at Rs 4, we will find a match for you with NO at Rs 6 or more. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}, {"type": "ALERT_BANNER", "details": {"type": "DEFAULT", "title": "Please Note", "iconName": "!", "subTitle": "You can book profits only if your order status is matched. For unmatched trades, the investment amount is refunded to the user after the event expires.", "iconIsMaterial": true}}]}

text: What is Points Rummy?
title: What is Points Rummy?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Points rummy is a variant of 13 cards Indian Rummy where players play for points with pre-decided rupee value. One player who makes the first valid declaration wins the game with 0 points and wins all the cash based on the opponents total points.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Pool Rummy?
title: What is Pool Rummy?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Pool Rummy is a variant of 13 card Indian Rummy where players pay a fixed entry fee which forms the prize pool. Winner of every deal gets 0 points and the rest accumulated points are added to their score. A player is eliminated once their score reaches the maximum limit of points on the table eg: 101 Points Pool or 201 Points Pool.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Deals rummy?
title: What is Deals rummy?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Deal Rummy is a variant of 13 card Indian Rummy where players pay a fixed entry fee which forms the prize pool. In this variant, players pay with score allocated at the start of each game. It is also played for a pre-decided number of deals or rounds. At the end of each round, winner takes all score lost by opponents. Winner is decided based on the person who has the most score at the completion of all deals.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How to play Rummy?
title: How to play Rummy?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "-", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How do I declare?
title: How do I declare?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "To declare the player must show the cards in hand by grouping them in sets/sequences and clicking on the 'Declare' button.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Deposit Cash?
title: What is Deposit Cash?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Deposit Cash is the cash you added to MPL wallet from your Bank Account / Cards. It CANNOT be withdrawn. It can only be used on the MPL app.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Which deposit modes are available on MPL?
title: Which deposit modes are available on MPL?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can deposit money on MPL using any of the Modes present on the checkout page. The modes include , UPI, Paytm , Amazon Pay , Credit Cards , Debit Cards, Net-banking of 50+ banks.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I cannot see my preferred mode of payment.
title: I cannot see my preferred mode of payment.
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "We have included many modes on the checkout page. If you are trying for net banking , you can check that by clicking on the banks list. If your bank is missing from the list, please let us know and we will add your bank.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Money from my account is debited but not credited to the MPL account
title: Money from my account is debited but not credited to the MPL account
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "There may have been a technical issue at your bank end due to which this happened. If we receive the money we will credit it to your MPL account. If we do not receive the money the same will be refunded to your bank account by your bank in 7-10 working days. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I am getting an error while linking Paytm wallet
title: I am getting an error while linking Paytm wallet
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You'll have to check with Paytm, if they have blocked your account for some reason.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: My Transaction says its been pending and money from my bank account is debited
title: My Transaction says its been pending and money from my bank account is debited
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Kindly do not panic! In such cases, please make another transaction. Any pending transaction where the amount is debited from your account, is credited back by your bank in 7-10 business days.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: There is a message saying 'This payment mode is experiencing a low success rate'. What should I do in such cases?
title: There is a message saying 'This payment mode is experiencing a low success rate'. What should I do in such cases?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "We actively try to nudge users to use payment modes with very high success rates. Whenever such message is shown in a payment mode, it is best to avoid that mode, as the servers might be slow. You can use other payment modes to deposit or withdraw money!", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How to apply a Coupon while depositing?
title: How to apply a Coupon while depositing?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can apply for a Coupon on the add money page , alternatively if you have gathered a coupon on a third party website, you can enter the coupon code and click on apply. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: UPI / Bank Withdrawal is pending
title: UPI / Bank Withdrawal is pending
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "It may take upto 3 business days for a UPI transaction and 7 business days for bank transfer to be reflected in your account.\n\nDo not worry, if the transaction fails at any point the money will be deposited back to your MPL wallet. This can happen due to issues in the banking infrastructure. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Money Not received in my Bank Account
title: Money Not received in my Bank Account
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If the withdrawal is marked success, we credit the same to your account. Due to technical errors at your bank end, there might be a delay with reflecting the amount. Please wait for 3-4 business days for the same, or raise the issue to the bank, with the details of the transaction that you can find in transaction history", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Where can I check my winnings?
title: Where can I check my winnings?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "After the game ends, your winnings will be credited it to your MPL wallet if you have won the game. Please check your MPL wallet.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Why is my opponent being searched/Why has my opponent not played?
title: Why is my opponent being searched/Why has my opponent not played?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "In few game formats, during matchmaking, if we cannot find an opponent for you, you can still go ahead and play the game. Once you have played the game, sit back and relax, your scores have been submitted successfully. Once your opponent has played, we will notify you about the game result.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Why is my Battle in Pending status?
title: Why is my Battle in Pending status?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Due to technical issues, your battle might have been stuck in pending state. Worry not, we’ll publish the results of the game in a while, and you’ll receive your winnings in your MPL wallet if you are eligible for the same.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Why is my battle cancelled?
title: Why is my battle cancelled?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Due to technical issues, your battle might have gotten cancelled. Worry not, we refund the entry fee instantly.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Where can I check the refund?
title: Where can I check the refund?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Please check your MPL wallet for the refunded entry fee for the battle.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I want to withdraw all my winnings at once. Is it possible?
title: I want to withdraw all my winnings at once. Is it possible?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Due to security reasons, you can only withdraw upto a sum of 2 lakh rupees in a single withdrawal request. However, you can withdraw multiple times to encash the entire amount.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How to withdraw deposit or bonus cash?
title: How to withdraw deposit or bonus cash?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Deposit or Bonus cash CANNOT be withdrawn. Only Winning cash is withdrawable.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Where can I see my withdrawal history ?
title: Where can I see my withdrawal history ?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "On the Withdrawal Page , we have section for the history of your withdrawals", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How do I get the TDS certificate?
title: How do I get the TDS certificate?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can reach out to Customer Support for the TDS certificate. We will provide the same directly.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

title: I have won, but haven’t received the winnings

text: Where are my winnings?

text: What are Table cards?
title: What are Table cards?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Table cards are common cards that anyone can use to add to their hand. You can use 0,1,2 or all 3 card to make your best 3-card hand.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What are the hand priorities?
title: What are the hand priorities?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/1b8b12e497974b2e8fb3fe4a85da8c13.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "Below snapshot gives a view of hand priorities", "titleTwo": " ", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "b1", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.blue"}}]}

text: How do I Re-buy?
title: How do I Re-buy?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Once you have packed, you can rebuy. You can rebuy when you have money on the table also. There is a rebuy button that you can click and get money from your MPL wallet.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is the blind raise limit?
title: What is the blind raise limit?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The blind raise limit is set to 33% of your chip stack.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How to Sit out or Exit the table?
title: How to Sit out or Exit the table?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Using the buttons on the top left of the screen, you can sit out or exit the table. You can sit out and exit the table whenever you want. If you choose to sit out, you have 5 mins to sit back in otherwise you will be removed from the table. Choose to sit out if you want to remain on the table but want to take a small break for any reason. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Disconnected during the gameplay. What should I do?
title: Disconnected during the gameplay. What should I do?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Don’t worry. Reconnect to the app and click on the same lobby that you were playing in when you got disconnected. In case you do not get connected to the table for any reason, you can continue playing in the new table. All money you had on the table will be returned to you. All money that was bet and in the pot will go to the winner of the pot.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Win Patti Skill?
title: What is Win Patti Skill?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "This is a new card game where players can enter and sit on a table with a stack and play against other players. The player that has the best hand wins the pot.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How to play Win Patti Skill?
title: How to play Win Patti Skill?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "There are chaal, raise, pack, and sideshow options once your boot is paid. If you play blind, you have to pay half of the ongoing chaal. Once everyone is matched, table cards will open up. Your best hand is any 3 out of the 6 cards (3 table and 3 in hand).", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is the Boot amount?
title: What is the Boot amount?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Everyone pays boot amount to start the game. You will receive cards only once your boot amount is collected.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Side-show and side-pot? How is it helpful?
title: What is Side-show and side-pot? How is it helpful?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "There is no side-pot in this game. Side show is done to eliminate a player with a weaker hand. In a side-show, two hands are compared and the weaker hand is packed. No money is transferred here. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}, {"type": "ALERT_BANNER", "details": {"type": "DEFAULT", "title": "Please Note", "iconName": " ", "subTitle": "If both hands are the same, then the person asking for the sideshow packs.", "iconIsMaterial": true}}]}

text: Can I accept/reject the side-show?
title: Can I accept/reject the side-show?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "STEPPER", "details": {"steps": ["You can reject a sideshow twice from the same person. The third time you have to accept", "You cannot ask for a sideshow if you are blind", "If there are two people left", "you cannot reject a show."], "title": " "}}]}

text: How do I complete KYC verification on MPL?
title: How do I complete KYC verification on MPL?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Your winnings will be withdrawn to your account. Verifying PAN is a mandatory step to start the withdrawal process. 

You will be prompted for KYC when you try to withdraw. 
Alternatively you can go to your wallet section > scroll down to ‘KYC Verification’ section. 
You have to upload the PICTURE of front of your PAN card. 

Details such as full name, date of birth and PAN number should be clearly visible on the document. 

Please ensure that you are uploading the image of original PAN card. photocopy / scanned copy will not be accepted. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/064badadeeeb457fa55ea0f2e4db8c4e.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "Once submitted, it will take upto 60 sec to verify your PAN.", "titleTwo": " ", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b1", "titleTwoPreset": "b1", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}]}

text: What are the taxes applicable if I win?
title: What are the taxes applicable if I win?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "According to the Income Tax Act of 1961, 31.2% of tax will be deducted if an individual’s net winnings for a single contest exceed Rs. 10,000. Your winnings balance will be credited with the remaining amount (68.8%).\n\nFor instance, if a player wins Rs. 1,000,000, tax of Rs. 31,200 will be deducted, and the actual winnings will amount to Rs. 68,800.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}
