title: How can I see the result of the leaderboard I have played in the past?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can go to the game history page from the lobby page and see the results in Tournaments.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How do I progress to the next level?
title: How do I progress to the next level?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "For every cash game you play, you’ll earn experience points or XP. When you collect enough XP, you will automatically unlock the next level and get promoted. In order to claim your rewards, all you have to do is visit the Rewards page and hit claim. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How long will this program be valid?
title: How long will this program be valid?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The program is valid for 30 days from the time you start. Every time you get promoted to the next level, the timer resets and starts for 30 days. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is MPL Rewards?
title: What is MPL Rewards?

text: How will I know my winnings?
title: How will I know my winnings?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Once the leaderboard has ended, you’ll be able to see the winnings and the stars that you have earned. Kindly check your MPL wallet for your winnings. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How can I see my stars and level?
title: How can I see my stars and level?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Please go to Ludowin’s lobby page and at the top, you’ll find your current tier and the stars you have earned by playing the leaderboard. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How long will the leaderboard run?
title: How long will the leaderboard run?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "A leaderboard will run for 24 hours.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What are the different levels in MPL Rewards?
title: What are the different levels in MPL Rewards?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "POINTS", "details": {"type": "BULLET", "title": "MPL Rewards has 7 levels", "points": ["Beginner’s Club", "Professional’s Club", "Expert’s Club", "Champion’s Club", "Master’s Club", "Hero’s Club", "Legend’s Club"], "titlePreset": "b1", "pointsPreset": "b1", "titleTextColor": "black", "pointsTextColor": "black"}}, {"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "As you progress to higher levels, you unlock higher guaranteed cash rewards and more benefits like VIP customer support. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Where do I see my progress in MPL Rewards?
title: Where do I see my progress in MPL Rewards?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can track your progress in MPL Rewards either in your Profile or in your Wallet. You should see a small rectangular box mentioning which club you are in. Clicking that will take you to the MPL Rewards page where you can track how much XP you have received and how much more XP is needed in order to unlock the next reward. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Will I lose my progress after the program ends?
title: Will I lose my progress after the program ends?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "XP is only counted during the program duration so it will go to 0 after 30 days, but please don’t worry. Any cash rewards you unlock during the program can be claimed and instantly credited to your wallet. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Where can I check how much XP I have earned?
title: Where can I check how much XP I have earned?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can find the XP history on the Rewards page towards the top right. Selecting it will take you to the details page where you can see how much XP you have earned for different games. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What’s the duration of each game?
title: What’s the duration of each game?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "It can be very fast - as fast as 10 seconds.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Minute Poker-Unable to bid entry fee
title: Unable to bid entry fee
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "This can happen if you are in the middle of game (after pressing DEAL and before pressing DRAW). If the deal button is visible, you should be able to change the entry fee. In case there is still an issue, please take a screenshot and raise a ticket below and our agents will look into it.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is cancel option for trades?
title: What is cancel option for trades?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Once you place an order for a trade, you can check the status of the trade - whether it is matched/ unmatched. If your trade opinion has not been matched with another user and is in unmatched status, you can cancel the trade to get an instant refund of your investment for the unmatched number of trades.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/te/common/828332437bb0413c8b6fc0eabb0cdeeb.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "  ", "titleTwo": " ", "titleOneColor": "", "titleTwoColor": "", "titleOnePreset": "", "titleTwoPreset": "", "backgroundColor": "tint.yellow"}}]}

text: I have submitted my PAN but don’t see my certificates.
title: I have submitted my PAN but don’t see my certificates.
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If you have uploaded your PAN after the quarter is completed, you will receive the certificate after the end of next quarter.\n\nFor example, If you have uploaded your PAN in July 2022, you will receive TDS certificate for April to June 2022 starting 15th November.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is Minute Poker?
title: What is Poker Puzzle?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "VIDEO", "details": {"title": "How To Play Poker Puzzle", "videoSrc": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/customer-support/cs/b548acbc15b2473cb912292f212e7868.mp4", "titlePreset": "s1", "thumbnailSrc": "", "titleTextColor": "black"}}, {"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "This is a game where your poker skills are pitted against your understanding of probability. You get dealt five cards and you have to hold certain cards depending on your understanding of probability and risk/reward ratio.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Where can I find a cashback coupon or deposit offers?
title: Where can I find a cashback coupon or deposit offers?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can find any active cashback offers by visiting the ‘Offers’ section in your wallet.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Where can I check if I received my cashback?
title: Where can I check if I received my cashback?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can check this by going through the ‘Transaction history’ section in your wallet.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How can I withdraw money from my MPL wallet?
title: How can I withdraw money from my MPL wallet?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If you have winnings cash in your MPL wallet, you can withdraw it by going to your Wallet page and clicking on ‘Withdraw’. The withdrawn amount will be credited into your bank account once you have linked your bank account on MPL to withdraw money.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Which payment methods can I use to deposit money on MPL?
title: Which payment methods can I use to deposit money on MPL?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "We currently only support bank transfer for withdrawals, and will add more methods later on.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Minute Poker-Game is not working properly
title: Game is not working properly
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Please take a screenshot, raise a ticket below and our agents will look into it immediately.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I am unable to lock the cards.
title: I am unable to lock the cards.
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "After you press the deal button, you should be able to lock as many cards as you like.\nIf you are unable to do so, please raise a ticket and our agents will look into it.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Draw button is not working.
title: Draw button is not working.
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You have to press DEAL before you can DRAW.\nIf you have pressed DEAL already and cannot draw still, then please raise a ticket below and our agents will look into it.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I am not getting good cards.
title: I am not getting good cards.
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "This is based on a certified RNG randomiser and MPL has no control over card distribution.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Minute Poker-I am losing continuously
title: I am losing continuously.
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If this is the case, we recommend you pause for some time and try again.\nYou can also study probabilities and upskill yourself on what are the right cards to hold to maximize your winnings.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Minute Poker-Hand Rank is incorrect and I have not received correct winnings.
title: Hand Rank is incorrect and I have not received correct winnings
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If this is the case, please take a screenshot and raise a ticket below and our agents will look into it immediately.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-What is CR Challenge Game?
title: What is CR Challenge Game?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "In this game, you have to select a challenge and complete it in the Clash Royale game. The best score in the challenge wins the leaderboard!\n\nImprove your skills by playing regularly.  Through this game, you can have fun and earn money at the same time.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-How are leaderboard ranks decided?
title: How are leaderboard ranks decided?

text: CR-The leaderboard has ended and I have not received my winnings. Why?
title: The leaderboard has ended and I have not received my winnings. Why?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Winnings are credited once each player who entered the game before the Challenge end time has submitted his score. It can sometimes take half an hour after the challenge ends for all the players to submit the score. We will notify you once the Ranks are finalised and winnings are credited.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-Where can I see my score?
title: Where can I see my score?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Please click on Results and then select any Challenge you have participated in. You will see your current Rank, Score & Prize Amount you are eligible for.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-Why my score is not getting updated, even after I have completed my game?
title: Why my score is not getting updated, even after I have completed my game?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You need to play a Battle in Clash Royale only to get your score registered. Make sure you give us enough time and wait for our message once the game is ended.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-Why am I not able to play the game?
title: Why am I not able to play the game?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "This game can only be played on Android OS 10 and above.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-Where can I get the winnings?
title: Where can I get the winnings?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Once the Challenge is over and scores are verified your winnings will be credited to your MPL wallet.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-How can I withdraw my winnings?
title: How can I withdraw my winnings?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Your Challenge winnings will be transferred to your MPL Wallet when the challenge ends, and your Rank is in the winning zone of the leaderboard. Go to your MPL Wallet and tap on ‘Withdraw’ to withdraw your winnings.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-What if the challenge gets cancelled?
title: What if the challenge gets cancelled?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The participation amount will be refunded to your MPL wallet.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-What is the maximum number of attempts allowed in a challenge?
title: What is the maximum number of attempts allowed in a challenge?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can find the maximum number of attempts allowed in every challenge, right below the entry fee.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-Can I cancel my registration if I don’t want to play in a challenge?
title: Can I cancel my registration if I don’t want to play in a challenge?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "No, once you have paid for a challenge you cannot cancel your registration.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-Why do you ask for recording & casting permissions?
title: Why do you ask for recording & casting permissions?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "We ask for these permissions so that we can monitor the game and give out the correct results based on your performance in the game. We only monitor when you are inside the game and not when you are on any other app or Background.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-Why do I need to give Usage Permission?
title: Why do I need to give Usage Permission?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "This permission is asked because so that we know when Clash Royale game is active so that we can start monitoring the game. We stop monitoring once player goes to background or open any other app", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-What will happen if I don’t give these permissions?
title: What will happen if I don’t give these permissions?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "These permissions are essential for us to conduct the game and give out a fair result. If you do not give the permission, you won’t be allowed to participate in the challenge.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-Do I need to have the same account for both Clash Royale and MPL in order to play?
title: Do I need to have the same account for both Clash Royale and MPL in order to play?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "No, you can have separate accounts for both MPL & Clash Royale and it will still work.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-Will my Clash Royale account get banned when I record and cast the game with Clash Royale Challenges?
title: Will my Clash Royale account get banned when I record and cast the game with Clash Royale Challenges?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "No. Your Clash Royale account will not get banned when you cast the game using Clash Royale Challenges.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-If I don’t have Clash Royale installed, do I need to download it separately or can I download it through Clash Royale Challenges?
title: If I don’t have Clash Royale installed, do I need to download it separately or can I download it through Clash Royale Challenges?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Yes, you will have to install the Clash Royale game from the Playstore and then come back to the App to Play.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: CR-Why do I need to give Overlay Permission?
title: Why do I need to give Overlay Permission?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "This permission is needed to show you important communication during the gameplay such as Opponent score, warnings etc on top of your game screen without interrupting the gameplay.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How do I deactivate my account?
title: How do I deactivate my account?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "We're sorry to hear that you want to leave. We request you to reconsider your decision to deactivate the account. But if you still wish to do so, kindly raise a request to our Customer Support team by clicking below.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How will I get a refund for my losses?
title: How will I get a refund for my losses?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "ALERT_BANNER", "details": {"type": "ERROR", "title": "Please Note", "iconName": " ", "subTitle": "Loss Refund is one time offer that is available only for selected users. If you are eligible to activate, you would see a Loss Refund Banner on your wallet page.", "iconIsMaterial": ""}}, {"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If your Loss Refund is active, and you have completed 10 cash games from eligible categories and you are in net loss, you can request a refund by clicking on the ‘Get Refund’ button on wallet page. It takes upto 72 hours to process your refund request. If your refund is approved, you will receive a refund in the form of deposit cash. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How many players are there in Minute Poker?
title: How many players are there in Poker Puzzle?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You are competing with all players of minute poker on a leaderboard. This leaderboard maps out the final winnings which is similar to the multipliers mentioned in the game view screen.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I am under 18 years of age. Am I allowed to play cash games on MPL?
title: I am under 18 years of age. Am I allowed to play cash games on MPL?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "No, only players who are more than 18 years of age are allowed to play on MPL in line with local regulations.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Do I receive any signup rewards after registering on the MPL app?
title: Do I receive any signup rewards after registering on the MPL app?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Yes, you will receive MPL coins after signing up, which can be used to play games on the app", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How can I sign up on the MPL app?
title: How can I sign up on the MPL app?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can signup by downloading the app from mpl.ng and registering via phone number. A numeric OTP (One time Password) will be sent to your phone number for verification before signup.", "color": "", "preset": ""}]}}]}

text: Can I withdraw the MPL coins I receive after signing up or while playing on MPL?
title: Can I withdraw the MPL coins I receive after signing up or while playing on MPL?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "No. MPL coins can only be used as entry fees in specific games and contests, and cannot be withdrawn", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I am not getting the OTP on my phone. What should I do?
title: I am not getting the OTP on my phone. What should I do?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can try clicking on the ‘Resend OTP' button and wait for a minute to get the OTP. If you are still unable to get the OTP, you can send an email to ngcommunity@mplgaming.com and we’ll try to revert to you as soon as possible", "color": "", "preset": ""}]}}]}

text: I am under 18 years of age. Why am I not allowed to log in and play on MPL?
title: I am under 18 years of age. Why am I not allowed to log in and play on MPL?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "This is part of our terms and conditions policy. MPL expects a level of maturity from the incoming players and hence the condition around age.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I have a referral code for the MPL Pro app. Where/how do I redeem it?
title: I have a referral code for the MPL Pro app. Where/how do I redeem it?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If you have downloaded the app via a referral link, the referral code will automatically be applied. If not, then you can enter the referral code during signup by clicking on ‘Apply Referral / Promo code’.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Why do I need to agree to the terms of service, fairplay policy and privacy policy to sign up?
title: Why do I need to agree to the terms of service, fairplay policy and privacy policy to sign up?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "A new user must agree/abide to the terms and conditions, fairplay policy and privacy policy laid down by MPL. These lay down the boundaries, rules and conditions within which a user can play and earn money on MPL, and enable a safe and pleasant experience for our players.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How can I refer a friend to the MPL app?
title: How can I refer a friend to the MPL app?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can refer a friend by visiting the ‘Refer and Earn’ section and sharing a referral link on whatsapp / instagram / telegram or any other messaging / email app.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What are the rewards that my friend and I would receive after my friend signs up with my referral code?
title: What are the rewards that my friend and I would receive after my friend signs up with my referral code?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If your friend signs up successfully on the MPL app using your referral code, both of you receive NGN 50. Additionally, if you friend makes a deposit on the app, both of you receive 25% of the first deposit amount (upto a maximum reward of NGN 250)", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is a referral leaderboard?
title: What is a referral leaderboard?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "A referrer leaderboard shows the rank of players in the order of maximum number of successful referrals brought to the app in that week. Players at the top positions on the referral leaderboard get extra cash rewards.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is a super referrer offer?
title: What is a super referrer offer?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The super referrer offer is a limited period offer where you can earn extra rewards on reaching specific referral milestones while the offer is active.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is the maximum number of friends I can refer?
title: What is the maximum number of friends I can refer?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "There is no upper limit for how many friends you can refer to MPL. However, you will get rewarded for only upto 5 referrals in a week.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Does this weekly referral limit also apply to the referral leaderboard and super referrer offer?
title: Does this weekly referral limit also apply to the referral leaderboard and super referrer offer?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "This limit does not apply for participating in the referral leaderboard and super referrer offer. If you rank at the top positions on the referral leaderboard, or reach your milestones for the super referrer offer you will still receive the extra rewards based on your rank / milestone. The per referral reward, however, will be limited to 5 referrals in a week.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is MPL coins, deposit cash and winning cash?
title: What is MPL coins, deposit cash and winning cash?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "POINTS", "details": {"type": "BULLET", "title": " ", "points": ["MPL coins is an in-app currency that you can earn as signup bonus or by completing specific tasks, it can be used as entry fee in some cash contests and cannot be withdrawn", "Deposit cash is the money added to your MPL wallet (in Naira) from your bank account, which can be used to play all cash contests, it cannot be withdrawn", "Winnings cash is the actual cash earned on the app by playing games, and can be withdrawn anytime into your bank account"], "titlePreset": "", "pointsPreset": "b1", "titleTextColor": "", "pointsTextColor": "black"}}]}

text: How can I deposit money on MPL to play cash games?
title: How can I deposit money on MPL to play cash games?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can add money to your MPL account by going to your wallet, clicking on ‘Add cash’ and selecting / entering the amount you wish to add.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How can I apply a cashback coupon?
title: How can I apply a cashback coupon?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can redeem a cashback coupon on the add cash page by either selecting an available coupon or entering a valid coupon code in the relevant textbox.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Where will I get the cashback?
title: Where will I get the cashback?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The cashback, if any, will be credited to your MPL wallet in the form of deposit cash or MPL coins depending on the offer construct.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I cannot find my preferred mode of payment. What should I do?
title: I cannot find my preferred mode of payment. What should I do?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "We have included many payment modes to deposit money to your MPL account. If your bank or preferred payment method is missing from the list, please let us know by going to the MPL helpdesk in the app.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Money from my account has been debited but not credited into my MPL wallet. What should I  do?
title: Money from my account has been debited but not credited into my MPL wallet. What should I  do?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "There may have been a technical issue at your bank end due to which this happened. If we receive the money from your bank we will credit it to your MPL account within 48 hours. If any excess TDS is deducted, the same can be claimed back while filing ITR.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: faq-tds
title: How is TDS calculated on MPL?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The TDS will be deducted at the time of withdrawal and at the year end.




Financial year is 1st April - 31st March.
30% TDS will be applicable if the net winnings of a player is positive. (greater than zero). 
Your deposit and withdrawal ledger will become zero at 00:00 hours on 1st April of every financial year.
Your net-winnings are calculated based on;
Net winnings = [Total withdrawals in FY - (Total deposits in FY + Net winnings which have already suffered TDS during the FY + Opening balances as of 1st April 00:00)]
If your net winnings at the time of making a withdrawal is positive, 30% TDS will be applicable on any amount being withdrawn. 

Lets understand with some examples: ", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/customer-support/cs/562b4159c2984fafb32f125541052028.jpeg", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "Scenario 1", "titleTwo": "on 1st April, you have 7000 in your winnings balance and 8000 in deposit balance. Now you try to withdraw 7000 on 2nd April. No TDS will be applied. ", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b2", "titleTwoPreset": "b2", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/customer-support/cs/d17d83afd37f42f097fd2a1475e8ad1f.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "Scenario 2 ", "titleTwo": "Now consider that you deposit 3000 in the current financial year and your opening deposit balance is 8000. You have already withdrawn 7000.  Now you want to withdraw 5000", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b2", "titleTwoPreset": "b2", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}, {"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Amount that you can withdraw without tax is ₹4000. Tax will be applicable on remaining ₹1,000. ₹300 will be deducted from ₹1000 and ₹4700 will be added to your bank account. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}, {"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Scenario 3 
If TDS has been applied to your previous withdrawals, then no TDS is applicable on withdrawals till your net winnings exceed the amount for which you have already paid TDS.
 
Your total withdrawals till date is ₹20,000
Your total deposits in FY is ₹6,000
Opening deposit balance is ₹8,000
Net winnings on which TDS is paid is ₹6000 (20,000 - (6000 + 8000)). 
if you try to withdraw ₹5500, no TDS will be deducted. You can withdraw upto ₹6,000 without any TDS. 
If you wish to withdraw ₹10,000, TDS will be charged on ₹4000 @30%. ₹1,200 will be deducted and ₹8800 will be added to your bank account .

Please watch video for detailed explanation : https://youtu.be/v5oLw39so_k", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is TDS?
title: What is the TDS policy?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "From 1st April’23, Income tax department has introduced a new TDS section for Winnings from online games i.e, 194BA. The net winnings are calculated at the time when a user place a request for withdrawal (or at the year end on the closing balance) and TDS is calculated @30% on the net winnings comprised in withdrawal/ Closing Balance at year end.

Important points: 

The TDS will be deducted at the time of withdrawal.

The TDS will be applicable only on net winnings comprised in withdrawal and not the deposits.

Your deposit and withdrawal ledger will become zero at 00:00 hours on 1st April of every financial year.

Net winnings = [Total withdrawals in FY - (Total deposits in FY + Net winnings which have suffered TDS during the FY + Opening balances )]", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is the TDS policy?
title: What is the TDS policy?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "From 1st April’23, Income tax department has introduced a new TDS section for Winnings from online games i.e, 194BA. The net winnings are calculated at the time when a user place a request for withdrawal (or at the year end on the closing balance) and TDS is calculated @30% on the net winnings comprised in withdrawal/ Closing Balance at year end.

Important points: 

The TDS will be deducted at the time of withdrawal.

The TDS will be applicable only on net winnings comprised in withdrawal and not the deposits.

Your deposit and withdrawal ledger will become zero at 00:00 hours on 1st April of every financial year.

Net winnings = [Total withdrawals in FY - (Total deposits in FY + Net winnings which have suffered TDS during the FY + Opening balances )]", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Will TDS be deducted on my leaderboard winnings?
title: Will TDS be deducted on my leaderboard winnings ?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "All winnings from leaderboard will be added to the winnings wallet without deducting TDS. It will be deducted once you initiate a withdrawal based on your net winnings.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How is TDS calculated on MPL?
title: How is TDS calculated on MPL?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Scenario 3

Your total withdrawals till date is ₹20,000
Your total deposits in FY is ₹6,000
Opening deposit balance is ₹8,000
Net winnings on which TDS is paid is ₹6000 (20,000 - (6000 + 8000)). 
if you try to withdraw ₹5500, no TDS will be deducted. You can withdraw upto ₹6,000 without any TDS. 
If you wish to withdraw ₹10,000, TDS will be charged on ₹4000 @30%. ₹1,200 will be deducted and ₹8800 will be added to your bank account ", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/customer-support/cs/7f009e499dd04f259199a9c56d5331fa.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": "Scenario 1", "titleTwo": "on 1st April, you have 7000 in your winnings balance and 8000 in deposit balance. text: Does MPL deduct any TDS on my withdrawals?
title: Does MPL deduct any TDS on my withdrawals?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "From 1st April’23, Income tax department has introduced a new TDS section for Winnings from online games i.e, 194BA. The net winnings are calculated at the time when a user place a request for withdrawal (or at the year end on the closing balance) and TDS is calculated @30% on the net winnings comprised in withdrawal/ Closing Balance at year end.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: My TDS has been deducted, do I get any TDS certificate for the same?
title: My TDS has been deducted, do I get any TDS certificate for the same?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "MPL deducts TDS and deposit the same with Government. If you have provided your correct PAN to MPL, You can view your TDS deduction details in your 26AS ( which is updated after every quarter).", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Will the ledger reset on 1st April of every new Financial Year?
title: Will the ledger reset on 1st April of every new Financial Year?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Yes, All deposits and withdrawals will be re-set to 0 at 00:00 hrs 31st March; for the purpose of Computation of Net winnings.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Is there any threshold amount above which TDS is applicable?
title: Is there any threshold amount above which TDS is applicable?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "There is no threshold limit available u/s 194BA of the Income Tax Act, 1961. TDS is applicable whenever a withdrawal request is placed and Net winnings is positive.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is TDS Refund?
title: What is TDS Refund?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "TDS Refund is an MPL ONLY initiative to refund a your TDS [Tax to govt.] when you withdraw. \nRefund is credited your MPL deposit wallet, after completion of a successful withdrawal. Refund will not be provided for failed withdrawals.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is a referral leaderboard?
title: What is a referral leaderboard?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "A referrer leaderboard shows the rank of players in the order of maximum number of successful referrals brought to the app in that week. Players at the top positions on the referral leaderboard get extra cash rewards.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What if i end up paying extra TDS?
title: What if i end up paying extra TDS?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "At the end of the financial year 00:00 hrs on 31st March, your final TDS will be calculated depending on the financial year net winnings. \n\nFurther, Since the winnings earned from Online Gaming are chargeable to tax @30%. User’s need to file their ITR and the total TDS deducted can be adjusted against the Winnings liable for tax. If any excess TDS is deducted, the same can be claimed back while filing ITR.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I have made a successful withdrawal but did not receive any cash back
title: I have made a successful withdrawal but did not receive any cash back
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "To activate the offer, you need to make a successful deposit of min Rs 1. The offer will get activated for the next 30 days. \n\nOn your next successful withdrawal, if any TDS gets deducted, same will be credited as a refund to your deposit cash. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I am unable to see the TDS refund received
title: I am unable to see the TDS refund received
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "TDS refund will be added to your deposit wallet. \nYou can see the refund credit on your transaction history section. ", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How is the pricing for a question decided?
title: How is the pricing for a question decided?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "For each question, the price of Yes + No options is equal to a total of Rs 10 with Yes/No options trading anywhere between Rs 0.5 to Rs 9.5. You can win Rs 10 per quantity for every correct answer. The pricing of a question dynamically changes with the probability of “yes” or “no” for that particular question.  

Example: Will IND win the match vs NZ? 
As the match progresses, the price of Yes and No will vary depending on how IND and NZ are playing. If IND starts playing well, the price of Yes will keep going up while if IND is not playing well (losing early wickets etc.), the price of No will go up.
", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: My trade is Unmatched state, what does that mean? // How is matching done for any order?
title: My trade is Unmatched state, what does that mean? // How is matching done for any order?

text: What are the Topics available on Opinio?
title: What are the Topics available on Opinio?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "On Opinio, you will find questions on a wide range of topics covered under different categories. Currently, we have questions live on cricket category (T20, T10, ODI, Test), football and Crypto (Bitcoin). We will also be going live with the below categories soon: 
Other Sports (NBA, Tennis, Kabaddi, etc) 
Other Crypto coins (Eth etc.)
Entertainment and many more..", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I put an investment of Rs 4 (YES option) in a question. My investment was changed to Rs 3.5 (YES option) and I got a refund of 0.5 - how did that happen?
title: I put an investment of Rs 4 (YES option) in a question. My investment was changed to Rs 3.5 (YES option) and I got a refund of 0.5 - how did that happen?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "When the user selects Rs 4 - Yes, we try to find a match at Rs 6 - No. In case a better match is found for the user (Rs 6.5 - No or more), we will do a match with that user at No and refund the difference. (In case a match is found with Rs 6.5 - No, we will match the user at Rs 3.5 - Yes and refund Rs 0.5 to them). We always match you at the best price available for you (minimum price)\n", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I placed a Sell order but have not received any winnings?
title: I placed a Sell order but have not received any winnings?

text: What is the SELL action for any matched order?
title: What is the SELL action for any matched order?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Sell action is available when your opinion has been matched with another user and is in matched status. As the price of “Yes” or “No” keeps fluctuating, you can sell your order at any time before the question ends to book your profits or minimise your loss (even before the question results are out.) \n", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: Can I make multiple entries for a single question on different options?
title: Can I make multiple entries for a single question on different options?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Yes, You can invest in multiple options in the same question to hedge your risks. You can also re-invest on the same option as well.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How are the returns calculated for any order?
title: How are the returns calculated for any order?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can win Rs 10 for every trade you win. Example : If you have traded 100 quantities of a question at Rs 2.5 and you won the question. Your gross winnings will be (10 * 100) = 1000

You can also win before the question results are out by exiting at a higher price than you bought them at. Example : If you have invested on 100 quantities of a question at Rs 2.5 and you exited the order at Rs 5. Your gross winnings will be (5 * 100) = 500

Note that the platform fees will be deducted from your winnings before wallet credit.
", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What is the fees deducted while playing this game?
title: What is the fees deducted while playing this game?

text: Can I make a partial bet in an all in or fold format?
title: Can I make a partial bet in an all in or fold format?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "No, in this format, you can only go all in or fold your hand.", "color": "black", "preset": "h2"}]}}]}

text: Can I raise the bet in an all in or fold game?
title: Can I raise the bet in an all in or fold game?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "No, the only options are to go all in or fold; raising the bet is not allowed.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: What is the All-in or Fold format in Poker?
title: What is the All-in or Fold format in Poker?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "All in or fold\" is a format in poker where players must either go all in with their chips or fold their hand, removing the option to make smaller bets.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: Why is my stack getting auto topped up?
title: Why is my stack getting auto topped up?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "To ensure fair play in All-in or Fold tables, all users need to have the same min stack to play in a hand.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: What does the Save Winnings button do?
title: What does the Save Winnings button do?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "It carries all your extra stack to your wallet post the completion of the hand.?", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: Why should I play All-In or Fold?
title: Why should I play All-In or Fold?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "All-In or Fold is a very exciting game format with faster game play. Playing all in or fold can create more intense and action-packed gameplay, providing opportunities for big wins or quick eliminations.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: What happens if I dont have money left in my wallet to top up my stack?
title: What happens if I dont have money left in my wallet to top up my stack?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "In this case, you will be allowed to play with whatever amount is left with you.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: Are questions based on real future events?
title: Are questions based on real future events?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "All questions are based on real events. Every future event has a probability of happening in the present. Questions can be of 2 types depending on the format that you are playing on:\nPlay format - Questions based on outcome of future events e.g.Will Ind win the match vs Aus?\nFantasy Points format - Questions based on fantasy points calculation for the playing teams e.g.Will Ind score more fantasy points than Aus?", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How to play on any question in the Play format?
title: How to play on any question in the Play format?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can place your order on either “Yes” or “No”\nExample: Will IND win the match vs NZ? \nIf you think IND will win, select “yes”, else select “no”. You can change the price of “Yes” or “No” based on your opinion.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How to play on any question in the Fantasy Points format?
title: How to play on any question in the Fantasy Points format?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can place your order on either “Yes” or “No”
Example: Will IND score more fantasy points than NZ? 
If you think IND will score more fantasy points, select “yes”, else select “no”. You can change the price of “Yes” or “No” based on your opinion.
Note that in fantasy points format, it is possible that the team winning the match might have lesser fantasy points than the losing team as there are multiple factors which are used for calculating the team score.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}, {"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/customer-support/cs/fa63733a53544de1bc0212c3402c5658.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": " ", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "b1", "titleTwoPreset": "b1", "backgroundColor": "tint.pink"}}]}

text: What will happen to my poker wallet?
title: What will happen to my poker wallet?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Now you can pay from MPL wallet directly. Poker wallet will be removed shortly.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What happened to my money in poker wallet?
title: What happened to money in my poker wallet?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Entire amount has been transferred to your MPL wallet. You can check your MPL wallet for future details.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Where can I see my poker winnings?
title: Where can I see my poker winnings?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Your winnings would reflect in your MPL wallet. You can see MPL wallet transactions to verify.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: Why can’t I see transactions that were made last week?
title: Why can’t I see transactions that were made last week?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can only see upto 100 transactions in MPL wallet. For transactions you are unable to see, please reach out to our Customer support team.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: What is GST?
title: What is GST?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "GST is an Indirect Tax which needs to be charged from end user's w.r.t Supply of Goods or Services by the Supplier", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: Why is GST been charged on Add cash?
title: Why is GST been charged on Add cash?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "As per GST law, effective from 1st October'23, GST @28% is applicable on any amount deposited by user's in any gaming platform and hence MPL need to charge GST @28% on the amount deposited by user's through normal banking channels.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: My GST was credited as cashback, will I have pay it directly to the governament ?
title: My GST was credited as cashback, will I have pay it directly to the governament ?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "No, MPL will be directly remmiting the GST amount to the goverment on deposit done by you in our platform", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: Will I have to pay GST on my past transactions as well (made before 1st October)?
title: Will I have to pay GST on my past transactions as well (made before 1st October)?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "No, the new GST law is applicable from 1st October'23 onwards", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: How is GST calculated ?
title: How is GST calculated ?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "For instance, a player deposits ₹100 on an online gaming platform.That player will receive only ₹78.12 in their account after a 28% GST deduction of ₹21.88. Further a cashback of Rs 21.88 will be instansly credited to his deposit wallet which is freely usable in the platform.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: What will be the proof of GST submission to government by MPL ?
title: What will be the proof of GST submission to government by MPL ?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "During deposit (Add Cash), the platform will automatically calculate the GST amount. This amount will be submitted paid to the government. As a proof, a GST invoice will be generated and provided to all players. This will be visible and can be downloaded from the Add Cash success screen and the Wallet section.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: "When will the new GST rate be effective? "
title: When will the new GST rate be effective?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The new GST rate of 28% will be effective from 1st October 2023.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: Who is charging this GST?
title: Who is charging this GST?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The government is charging GST at the rate of 28% on every deposit (Add Cash). MPL plays no role in taxes applied by the government. MPL is just collecting this on behalf of Goverment and remitting it back to goverment.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: What is the same price sell commission on opinio ?
title: What is the same price sell commission on opinio ?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Zero commission on the same price sold on Opinio.
In this case money will be returned back to the source wallet where money was debited from.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}, {"text": "Ex :
Investment of Rs 1000 | Buy Price : Rs 5 | Quantity : 200
Deposit - 200
Winnings - 800

After same price sell as 
Sell Price : Rs 5 | Quantity : 200
Total credit : Rs 1000
Deposit - 200
Winnings - 800", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: What are battles? How are they different from tournaments?
title: What are battles? How are they different from tournaments?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Battles and tournaments are two different formats to play a game.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}, {"text": "A battle is a one time gameplay against a real opponent. You can enter a battle by paying the entry fee, after which we find an opponent with similar skill as you, and you get the match result and winnings immediately after playing the game. A battle can be played against one opponent or multiple opponents.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}, {"text": "A tournament is a contest with multiple participants. The entry fee is deducted once, post which you can play as many games as possible to rank on the contest leaderboard. The top ranked players on the leaderboard win cash rewards (as per the rules defined in the tournament) after the tournament ends.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How can I withdraw money from my MPL wallet?
title: How can I withdraw money from my MPL wallet?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If you have winnings cash in your MPL wallet, you can withdraw it by going to your Wallet page and clicking on ‘Withdraw’. The withdrawn amount will be credited into your bank account once you have linked your bank account on MPL to withdraw money.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What happens to my entry fee if I don’t get matched with an opponent?
title: What happens to my entry fee if I don’t get matched with an opponent?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Your fee is not deducted from your MPL account till an opponent has been found.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What happens if I get disconnected or exit while playing the game?
title: What happens if I get disconnected or exit while playing the game?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "We try to reconnect you. At the end of 10 seconds, if you are not back, your game will end. You might win or lose based on your last recorded score.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: When do I get my winnings into my MPL account?
title: When do I get my winnings into my MPL account?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You will get the winnings in your MPL account as soon as the battle has ended.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How do I participate in a battle?
title: How do I participate in a battle?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Find a battle room as per your liking under the game of your choice. Each battle room has an entry fee per battle. Pay to play once. Amount gets deducted each time you start a new battle.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What happens if I leave after an opponent has been matched with me?
title: What happens if I leave after an opponent has been matched with me?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If either you or your opponent leaves before the game starts, your fee will be refunded. This generally takes less than 5 minutes. However, in some cases it might take up to 24 hours.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What happens if I minimize the app while playing the game?
title: What happens if I minimize the app while playing the game?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Your game will end. You might win or lose based on your last recorded score.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: I have a referral code for the MPL app. Where/how do I redeem it?
title: I have a referral code for the MPL app. Where/how do I redeem it?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If you have downloaded the app via a referral link, the referral code will automatically be applied. If not, then you can enter the referral code during signup by clicking on ‘Apply Referral / Promo code’.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: How can I refer a friend to the MPL app?
title: How can I refer a friend to the MPL app?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You can refer a friend by visiting the ‘Refer and Earn’ section and sharing a referral link on whatsapp / instagram / telegram or any other messaging / email app.", "color": "black", "preset": "b1"}]}}]}

text: What are the rewards that my friend and I would receive after my friend signs up with my referral code?

text: How is a hand played?
title: How is a hand played?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "At the start of each round, a Vira card is revealed to both players at the start of the round. For the duration of that round, the card with a higher power than the Vira becomes the most powerful card for that round (i.e.,  the Manilhas).
For example: 
-If the Vira is a Jack, the Queen becomes the strongest card for that round
- If the Vira is a 3, the Manilhas are the 4s

When a Manilha card is played, the suit of the Manilhas have a power in the order - Clubs > Hearts > Spades > Diamonds
For any card except the Manilhas, the suit does not matter

For example: 
-If Kings are the Manilhas and one player plays King[Hearts], and the other player plays King[Clubs], the second player wins. However, if Kings are the Manilhas and both players play a 3, the hand is tied

Players alternate turns, playing one card at a time.

In each turn, the players play a card, whoever has a higher card wins the hand
", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: What happens if an opponent's pawn is captured in a game?
title: What happens if an opponent's pawn is captured in a game?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If an opponent's pawn is captured, it is typically removed from the board and must be returned to a designated starting point. The captured pawn will need to restart its journey from the beginning. However, many games feature safe zones—marked by specific colors or stars—where a pawn cannot be captured. These safe zones protect the pawn and allow it to remain in play even if an opponent's pawn lands on the same square.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

title: What happens if I disconnect?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "\"If you reconnect within the game window, you resume from where you left off with the same score and remaining time. \n\nIf you do not reconnect, your last saved score is used.\"", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: How do I call Truco?
title: How do I call Truco?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "If a player has good cards and feel they can win the round, they can raise the points stakes of the round to be worth more than 1 point.

Player (on their turn in a hand) can call "Truco" to raise the stakes to 3 points; the opponent can accept, refuse (opponent wins 1 point), or raise further:
"Seis!" to raise to 6 points.
"Nove!" to raise to 9 points.
"Doze!" to raise to 12 points, which is the maximum.

Only the round's points are affected by these calls.
", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: Como funcionam a pontuação e os bônus?
title: Como funcionam a pontuação e os bônus?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Após bater, você marca pontos com base na diferença entre suas cartas mortas e as do seu oponente. Você ganha um bônus ao conseguir \"gin\" (sem cartas mortas) ou se seu oponente tiver menos ou os mesmos pontos de cartas mortas após você bater.\nExemplo: Você bate com 7 pontos em cartas mortas, e seu oponente tem 15 pontos. Você marca 8 pontos (15 - 7). Se conseguir gin, você ganha um bônus extra de 25 pontos.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: When should you knock?
title: When should you knock?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "You should knock when your deadwood totals 10 points or less. Knocking ends the round, and you compare your hand with your opponent’s to score points.\nExample: If your deadwood is a 2 of hearts and a 5 of spades (totaling 7 points), you can knock to end the round.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: What is an undercut?
title: What is an undercut?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "An undercut occurs when you knock, but your opponent has deadwood points that are equal to or less than yours. In this case, your opponent scores the difference in points plus a 25-point bonus.\nExample: You knock with 7 points in deadwood, but your opponent has only 5 points. Your opponent scores 7 - 5 = 2 points plus a 25-point undercut bonus, totaling 27 points", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: Bingo - continuously getting bad numbers
title: Bingo - continuously getting bad numbers
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Bingo Skill is a skill-based game where the numbers are dropped randomly. We always aim to provide a fair gaming environment to our users, which is why we utilize a Random Number Generator (RNG) to distribute all numbers for a battle. The RNG system is designed to produce outcomes that are unpredictable and unbiased, ensuring each play is independent of previous plays. This randomness eliminates any possibility of pre-determined outcomes and prevents manipulation or bias in the game - by the platform or by other players. This is a key aspect of our fair play policy. \n\nWe understand that receiving an unfavorable set of cards can be frustrating at times. However, we firmly believe that Bingo Game, in the long run, involves a mix of both favorable and unfavorable numbers allowing users to master the game by developing their skills. ", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: How does scoring and bonuses work?
title: How does scoring and bonuses work?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "After knocking, you score points based on the difference between your deadwood and your opponent’s deadwood. You get a bonus for going \"gin\" (no deadwood) or if your opponent undercuts you (has equal or lower deadwood after you knock).\nExample: You knock with 7 points in deadwood, and your opponent has 15 points. You score 8 points (15 - 7). If you go gin, you get an extra 25 points.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: What is the new commission structure on Opinio ?
title: What is the new commission structure on Opinio ?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "STEP_DETAIL", "details": {"src": "https://cledge.mpl.live/pb/customer-support/cs/706edd31e51e4b5299de8d1a3bec1347.png", "type": "IMAGE", "titleOne": " ", "titleTwo": "Now commission will be charged on net profit at order level. This will be charged to user as per their tier on MPL app, for example if the user is of Master tier then commission will be 15% on net profit at order level. For commission percentage for all tiers refer to the table below.", "titleOneColor": "black", "titleTwoColor": "black", "titleOnePreset": "s1", "titleTwoPreset": "s1", "backgroundColor": "tint.yellow"}}, {"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "There will be zero commission on sell at the same price and sell at loss.

Investment of Rs 1000 | Buy Price : Rs 5 | Quantity : 200

Sell at | Sell Price : Rs 7 | Quantity : 200

Net Profit = (Sell Price - Buy Price ) x Quantity
= (7-5) x 200
= 400
Commission = 400 x 15% = 60

Total Credit = Sell Price  x Sell Quantity - Commission
= 1400 - 60 
= 1340", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The player that wins 2 of the 3 hands wins the round

text: How are scores calculated in Call Break?
title: How are scores calculated in Call Break?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": ""If you win all tricks equal to call made, you get 1 point. In case you win tricks more than the call made, you get points equivalent to call + 0.1 points for every extra trick.  If you win less tricks than the call made, you get negative score equal to call made. 
Example:
1) Player A calls 2 tricks, and wins 2 tricks, then 2 points are given.
2) Player B calls 2 tricks, and wins 5 tricks, then 2.3 points (2 points for call, and +0.1 points for every extra trick made) are given
3) Player C calls 2 tricks, and wins 1 trick, then -2 points are given"
4)How a player gets bonus points of 13  - If you call 8 or more hands, you will win 13 points if you win 8 or more hands. However, if you fail to win 8 or more hands, you will lose 8 points.", "color": "black", "preset": "b2"}]}}]}

text: How is the game played?
title: How is the game played?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The player with the 7 of hearts starts the game by discarding that card. Players take turns discarding sequential or eligible cards. Cards eligible for discard are one rank higher or lower than the top card on the table.

For example, if the table has the 7 of hearts and 8 of hearts, a player can play:

Any 7 (from any suit)

The 6 of hearts or the 9 of hearts

Each suit can only start with its respective 7.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: How does drop work in Rummy
title: How does drop work in Rummy
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "2 Player Games-
There is no option for players to drop a deal in 2 player games.
If a player does timeout for 2 turns, he/she is dropped automatically, by 80 points, from the game

More than 2 player games-
Each player gets an option to drop the game in their turn, throughout the game duration.
To avail the Drop option, the player must not have picked a card from open/closed deck in that turn.
First Drop - If a player drops the game in their very first turn, he/she gets 20 points.
Middle Drop - If a player drops the game in a turn other than the first, he/she gets 40 points.
Special case: If a player does timeout for 2 turns, he/she is dropped automatically from the game. This means that this player gets a middle drop score", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

content:

Ace is 10 points

2 is 2 points

King is 13 points

At the end of the game, a player's score is the sum of the points of the remaining cards in their hand. The winner, having no cards left, scores 0 points. If a player quits, they are penalized with 80 points.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: How are points calculated in Rummy?
title: How are points calculated in Rummy?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Each card carries a certain number of points. The losing player gets points equal to his/her hand score which is computed as follows :

J, Q, K, A of any suit carry 10 points each.

All other numbered cards carry the same points as their face value e.g. 7 carries 7 points and 3 carries 3 points.

Joker cards carry zero points.

At the end of the game, a losing player's hand score is computed by adding points for cards that are not grouped as sets/sequences with the following exceptions. 

If the losing player has no pure sequence, all cards are counted.

If the losing player does not have two sequences, but has a pure sequence, only the pure sequence is not counted.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: What kinds of cards are featured in the Whot game?
title: What kinds of cards are featured in the Whot game?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The game involves playing cards from a deck to match either the number or shape of the previously played card. There are different types of cards in the Whot game, each with its own unique characteristics:

Number Cards (1-14): These cards are numbered from 1 to 14 and are the most common cards in the deck. Players can match these cards based on their numerical value.

Symbol Cards: These cards feature various symbols such as triangles, squares, circles, stars, and crosses. Players can match these cards based on the shape of the symbols.

Whot Card: This is a special card that can be played at any time. When played, the player who played it chooses the shape or number that others must match.

Pick Two Card: When this card is played, the next player must pick up two cards from the draw pile and forfeit their turn.

Pick Three Card: Similar to the Pick Two card, but the next player must pick up three cards from the draw pile.

Hold On Card: When this card is played, it prevents the next player from playing any cards for one turn.

Suspension Card: This card skips the next player's turn.

General Market Card: This card reshuffles all played cards (except itself) back into the draw pile.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: What features benefit football fanatics?
title: What features benefit football fanatics?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Understanding Player History:
1. Start by quickly recognizing the players listed on the grid along with their teams to assess their past performances against each other.
2. Utilize detailed interaction history between offensive and defensive players on the grid to make strategic decisions.
3. Be aware of the teams the players represented during the specified period of data and how those teams performed.
4. Understand the timeframe during which two players were actively competing.

Developing a Strategy:
Given the option to exit the game at any point, a cautious approach involves answering safer or more obvious grid choices and leaving the game with a lower multiplier to avoid potential setbacks. On the other hand, a more aggressive strategy involves aiming for a higher multiplier by selecting more grid choices.

Considering Long-term and Short-term Goals:
Similar to the risk-based strategy, a player with a long-term perspective will exit the game at lower multipliers over time, while a player with a short-term focus will aim to achieve a high multiplier within a single game.
", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: What is a layoff?
title: What is a layoff?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "After you knock, your opponent can reduce their deadwood by adding some of their cards to your sets or runs. This is called a "layoff." However, layoffs can only happen if you knock with some deadwood (not if you go "gin" with no deadwood).
Example 01 :
Suppose you knock, and your hand includes a run of 6, 7, and 8 of hearts.
Your opponent has a 9 of hearts as part of their deadwood. They can lay off this 9 of hearts by adding it to your run, turning your sequence into 6, 7, 8, 9 of hearts.
This reduces your opponent's deadwood, lowering the points they lose by.
                   Example 02:
                     If you have a set of 3 kings (King of hearts, King of clubs, King 
                     of spades) and your opponent has the King of diamonds, 
                     they can lay off their King of diamonds by adding it to your set.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

Click on “Do you have a referral code?”, enter your code, and get started! signup via phone number (and OTP verification) on MPL.", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "On your turn, draw a card from either the draw pile or discard pile, then discard a card. Keep doing this until you can knock (if your deadwood is 10 points or less) or go \"gin\" (no deadwood).\nExample: You draw a 7 of clubs from the pile, which helps you complete a run with your 5 and 6 of clubs. text: What is the goal of Gin Rummy?
title: What is the goal of Gin Rummy?
content: {"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "The goal is to form sets (groups of the same number) and runs (consecutive numbers of the same suit) with your cards. You want to get rid of cards that don’t fit into these groups, called \"deadwood,\" to score points.\nExample: If you have a 5 of hearts, 5 of diamonds, and 5 of spades (a set), and a 2, 3, and 4 of clubs (a run), you’re on the right track. But if you also have a 7 of diamonds that don’t fit into a set or run, that’s deadwood.\n", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: What are Set, Run, and Deadwood?
title: What are Set, Run, and Deadwood?
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "1. Set: Three or four cards of the same number (e.g., 5 of hearts, 5 of diamonds, 5 of spades).
2. Run Three or more consecutive cards of the same suit (e.g., 2, 3, and 4 of clubs).
3. Deadwood: Cards that are not part of a set or run.
Example: If you have a 9, 10, and Jack of Spades, that’s a run. If you also have a 7 of hearts that doesn’t match anything else, it’s deadwood.
", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}

text: Basic MPL Ludo Rules
title: Basic MPL Ludo Rules
content:
{"componentsInOrder": [{"type": "TEXT_BOX", "details": {"textList": [{"text": "Number of Players: MPL Ludo typically accommodates 2 to 4 players, allowing for exciting multiplayer matches.

Automated Dice: Dice rolls are automated, and the players are only required to tap the dice to roll.

Limited Time: All the game modes on MPL Ludo feature a timer. The game ends when the timer ends and the winner is decided based on the higher score.

Capturing the Opponent's Token: When a player moves to the same tile as the opponent, they capture the opponent's token. In this case, the opponent's token is sent back to the start, and the player who captures the token gets extra points while the opponent's points decrease.

Extra Turns: Whenever an opponent's token is knocked off or gets to home, the player gets an extra turn of play in MPL Ludo. Moreover, in certain game modes, players also get an extra turn by rolling a six on the dice.
", "color": "black", "preset": "s1"}]}}]}
